loans.name: Nueva Generacion Las Flores Group

texts.es: La Sra. Luz tiene 60 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3  hijos pero que ya no dependen de ella. Pertenece al grupo “Nueva Generación Las Flores” lleva el cargo de presidenta y está conformada por 5 personas muy responsables que decidieron trabajar en equipo. Ella tiene como negocio una tienda donde vende todo tipo de golosinas y alimentos que implemento en su propia casa para poder solventar los gastos que tiene y llevar una mejor calidad de vida. El préstamo lo invertirá para surtir de más productos su tienda como golosinas, bebidas y alimentos. Luz está feliz y agradecida por el apoyo que está recibiendo por parte de los inversionistas. En la foto del grupo Ella se encuentra de pie en medio de las demás personas sentadas.
texts.en:
Luz is 60 years old, married, and has 3 children who are no longer economically dependent on her. She belongs to the “Nueva Generación Las Flores” loan group. She is the president of the group, which is made up of 5 responsible people who decided to work together as a team. 

Luz’ business is a store in her home where she sells all sorts of sweets and foods in order to afford the expenses she has and to have a better quality of life. She will use the loan to purchase more products for her store, such as sweets, soft drinks, and foods. Luz is happy and grateful for the support that she is receiving through the lenders. In the photo of the group, she is standing in the center of the others, who are seated.

loans.use: to buy sweets, soft drinks, and foods for her store.

loans.name: Luis Alexander

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive el señor Luis, tiene 24 años de edad, está casado y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 2 años de edad, su mujer es ama de casa.
Don Luis en un hombre que le gusta trabajar duro para darles lo mejor a su familia, el es taxista y se gana sus recursos realizando fletes de un lado a otro de la ciudad, pero en su casa el también y con la ayuda de su mujer tienen un pequeño deposito de venta de agua en bidón, mientras él puede está atento a los clientes que compran en su local o que le piden a domicilio o sino su mujer se encarga de vender, son 3 años dedicado a esta actividad la cual le permite ganar lo suficiente para sacar adelante a su familia . 
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar bidones de agua. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños es darle lo mejor a su familia y tener un taxi propio.
texts.en:
The "Las Divinas" credit group meets once every 15 days in the Tarqui neighborhood of the city of Manta. The city is known for its gorgeous beaches that are visited year-round by many, and for its unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions. 

This place is the home of Luis, who is 24 years old and married with a 2-year-old child. His wife is a stay-at-home mom. Luis is a man who likes to work hard to provide the best for his family. He is a taxi driver, and he makes his earnings carrying freight from one side of town to the other. 

With help from his wife, Luis also conducts sales from his home, where he has a small store of barrels of water. When he is able, he attends to customers who make purchases from his home or by delivery to their houses. Otherwise, his wife is in charge of the sales. They have been running this business for 3 years, and it has produced enough earnings to keep them moving forward.

He will use this loan to buy more drums of water. He has been with this credit group since its initiation, and he likes it because these loans started his business. His dream is to give the best to his family and to have his own taxi.

loans.use: to buy drums of water.

loans.name: María Edith

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
Aquí vive la señora María, tiene 53 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene seis hijos, cuatro mayores y dos de 15 y 11  años de edad, los tres menores aun viven en su casa y estudian en universidad, colegio y escuela. El marido es ayudante de mecánica.
Doña María es una mujer que el igual que su marido les gusta trabajar para salir adelante, ella  se dedican  a la compra y venta de mariscos, los sábados y domingos ella compra camarón, pescado, conchas entre otros mariscos los mismos que luego sale a vender a restaurantes  y negocios,  llevan más de 12 años con este negocio con el cual se gana algo por el bien de su familia.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar camarón, pescado, concha y otros mariscos. Lleva más de 6  años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque así ellos salen adelante. Sus sueños son seguir trabajando y darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The loan group "Las Divinas" meets every two weeks in the Tarqui neighborhood in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, which are much visited in every season of the year, and for being a city with an unequaled beauty and many tourist attractions.

Señora Maria lives here. She is 53 years old and maintains a free-union relationship, from which she has six children, four adults and two of 15 and 11 years of age. The three youngest still live in her house and study at the university, the secondary school, and the primary school. Her husband is a mechanical assistant.

Doña Maria is a woman who, like her husband, likes to work to get ahead. She buys and sells shellfish. On Saturdays and Sundays she buys shrimp, fish, and conchs, among other shellfish, which she then sells to restaurants and businesses. She has been in this business for more than 12 years, and with it she earns something for the benefit of her family.

She is going to use this loan to buy shrimp, fish, conchs, and other shellfish. She has been in the loan group for more than six years, and she likes it because this way they get ahead. Her dreams are to continue working and give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy shrimp, fish, conch, and other shellfish

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is married and has been blessed with four children who attend school. Her house has neither electricity nor piped water, but it is her own. Her main monthly expense is school fees for her children.

For the past four years Rebecca has raised and sold chickens to earn an income. Various poultry diseases are a challenge in her line of business.

Rebecca joined Kiva's field partner Yehu to avail herself of the business loans offered. She is applying for a 20,000 KES loan to buy more chicks and poultry feed. Her ambition is to become a poultry wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy chicks and poultry feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Romina

texts.es:
Romina está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, es de la ciudad de Lambaré, comenta que viene de una familia que lucha y se está esforzando por poder cumplir con sus metas.
Romina tiene una meta que es graduarse, especializarse en terapia pediátrica. Y más adelante tiene proyectado trabajar de manera independiente su área.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo para poder cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Romina is studying nursing. She is from the city of Lambaré. She explains that she comes from a hardworking family, and she is working hard to able to achieve her goals. 

Romina’s goal is to graduate and specialize in pediatric therapy. For the future, she plans to to work independently in her area.

She is requesting the loan to be able to pay the tuition for her courses and thereby continue with her studies as she has been doing, in order to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition.

loans.name: Sokhoeun's Group

texts.en:
Sokhoeun, forty, is single and a rural villager in Kampong Cham province. She farms rice to sell and has worked in construction for twenty-two years. She is also the head of a two-member group applying for this loan.

Recently, Sokhoeun’s crop was wiped out by insects, which caused her to face financial difficulties. She is applying for a 2,800,000 KHR loan through Kiva's field partner VisionFund Cambodia to be divided between her and her group partner. This will be the first loan they have taken out. She plans to use her portion to buy fertilizer for her rice fields.

Sokhoeun hopes her fields will flourish, provide a larger income for her and so enable her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice fields.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: ELLA ES UNA JOVEN SOLTERA QUIEN ESTA INICIANDO SU VIDA LABORAL Y AUN CUANDO SUS INGRESOS SON POCOS SU PRIMER PROPÓSITO ES ATENDER LA SALUD DENTAL DE SUS PAPAS, QUIENES DESDE HACE TIEMPO TIENE PROBLEMAS CON SU DENTADURA DEBIDO A QUE  AMBOS PERDIERON PIEZAS DENTALES Y POR PROBLEMAS ECONÓMICOS NO ATENDIERON A TIEMPO. AHORA ELLA QUIERE APOYARLOS PARA QUE SUS PAPAS RECUPEREN SU SALUD DENTAL Y LLEVEN UN MEJOR NIVEL DE VIDA.
texts.en:
She is a young woman who is beginning her working life, and even when her income is low, her first objective is to take care of her parents' dental health.
For some time they have had problems with their teeth, due to the fact that both lost teeth, and due to financial  problems they did not deal with it in time. Now she wants to support her parents in recovering their dental health and in having a better quality of life.

loans.use: To pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Jahaira Paola

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
Aquí vive la señora Jahaira, tiene 33 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 18, 12 y 10  años de edad, los tres estudian en universidad, colegio y escuela. El marido es zapatero.
Doña Jahaira realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice  en sus actividades, el tiene un local en su casa en la cual arregla todo tipo de calzado ya sea de caballeros, damas o niños, el tiene todo tipo de maquinas para realizar este tipo de arreglos, trabaja todos los días, ella le ayuda con su labor cuando  puede, a ella le encanta ayudarle ya que así pasa más tiempo juntos y  también contribuye en algo a los gastos de la familia, lleva más de 18 años dedicado a esta actividad la cual siempre le da lo necesario para vivir.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar cuero, caucho, clavos y otros materiales para realizar los arreglos en los zapatos. Lleva más de 7  años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ella le ayuda a su marido. Sus sueños son que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The loan group "Las Divinas" meets every two weeks in the Tarqui neighborhood in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, which are much visited in every season of the year, and for being a city with an unequaled beauty and many tourist attractions.

Señor Jahaira lives here. She is 33 years old and maintains a free union relationship from which she has three children, ages 18, 12, and 10. The three children study at the university, secondary school, and primary school. Her husband is a shoemaker.

Doña Jahaira is taking out the loan so that her husband can use it in his business. He has a shop in their house in which he repairs all types of footwear, whether it be men's, women's, or children's. He has every type of machine to do this type of repairs. He works every day. She helps him with his work when she can. She loves to help him, since this way they spend more time together and she also contributes something to the expenses of the family. He has been doing this work for more than 18 years, and it always gives him what is needed to live.

He is going to use this loan to buy leather, rubber, nails, and other materials to do the repairs on the shoes. She has been in the loan group for more than 7 years, and she likes it because thanks to the loans, she helps her husband. Her dreams are for her children to be professionals.

loans.use: to buy leather, rubber, nails, and other materials

loans.name: Fátima Moncerrate

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Fátima, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 14 y 12 años que estudian en colegio. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.
Doña Fátima realiza el crédito para que su esposo tenga los recursos necesarios para  realizar un gran trabajo, su esposo se dedica a la pesca, el junto a otra persona se van a alta mar  en su pequeña embarcación a realizar sus faenas de pesca, van pescando junto a un barco pesquero al cual le van entregando el producto de la pesca en los días que están dentro del mar, a veces el sale y no regresa hasta después de 15 días lo cual a ella le preocupa ya que hay mucho peligros en alta mar, pero él tiene que hacerlo por el bien de su familia. 
Este crédito es para  comprar redes, piolas, combustibles y alimentos para los días que están dentro del mar. Lleva más de 6 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda y los créditos adicionales que le brinda la institución. Sus sueños son tener un gran barco para que su esposo realice sus faenas de pesca.
texts.en:
The “Las Divinas” loan group meets every 15 days in the Tarqui neighborhood, in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, which have many visitors during all seasons of the year.  It is also known as a city with an unmatched beauty, with many tourist attractions.

Fatima lives in this place.  She is 36 years old and married, and from this relationship she has two children ages 14 and 12, who are in secondary school.  Her husband works in fishing.

Fatima is taking out the loan so her husband can have the necessary resources to do his great work.  Her husband works in fishing.  He and another person go out to high sea in their small boat to do their fishing work.  They fish alongside a fishing boat, to which they give their catch of fish during the days they are at sea.  Sometimes, he goes out and doesn’t return for 15 days, which worries her, since there are many dangers on the high seas.  But he has to do it for the good of his family.

This loan is to buy nets, fishing line, fuel, and food for the days they are out at sea.  She has been a member of this loan group for more than six years, and she likes it because of the help and the additional loans that the institution provides.  Her dreams are to have a large boat for her husband to do his fishing work.

loans.use: to buy nets, fishing line, fuel, and food.

loans.name: Gema María Alexandra

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Gema, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos, uno mayor y el menor de 14 años que estudia en colegio y es el que aun vive con ellos. Su esposo es jubilado.
Doña Gema es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, zapatos, sabanas, productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas) y productos que estén de temporada  ya que es lo  que más salida tiene y le deja buenas ganancias, ella también en su casa tiene un local en el cual además de vender estos productos también vende colas, aguas y golosinas con lo cual gana algo extra. Lleva más de 15 años que se dedica al comercio lo cual le permite ganar algo para el beneficio de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos, cosméticos, sabanas, colas y golosinas. Esta desde el inicio en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten salir adelante en su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
This is where Gema lives. She is 51 years old. She is married and from that relationship she and her husband have two sons. One is older and one is 14 years old and studies in high school, and still lives with them. Her husband is retired.

Gema is a homemaker who, in order to earn her own money, sells all kinds of clothing, shoes, bed sheets, Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories), and seasonal products, which generate her best sales and give her good profits. In her house, she also has a store where, in addition to selling these products, she also sells soft drinks, waters, and sweets, which bring in a little extra money. She has been in this business for more than 15 years, and it allows her to earn something for the benefit of her family.

This loan is to buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics, sheets, soft drinks, and sweets. She has been with the loan group since its beginning. She likes it because the loans let her get ahead with her business. Her dream is to give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics, sheets, soft drinks, and sweets.

loans.name: Gissela

texts.es:
Gissela sigue estudiando su carrera de administración de empresas, es una persona muy sacrificada que esta poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder crecer y cumplir con sus anhelos. Comenta que su anterior préstamo lo uso en poder pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
Pide hoy nuevamente este préstamo para poder pagar de nuevo las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le permitirá poder seguir esforzándose por mejorar.
texts.en:
Gissela is continuing her studies for her degree in business administration.  She is a very self-sacrificing person, who is putting forth her best effort to be able to grow and fulfill her wishes.  She comments that she used her previous loan to be able to pay her tuition, which helped her greatly.

Now she is requesting a new loan to be able to pay the tuition for her degree again.  This will allow her to be able to keep making an effort to improve.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition.

loans.name: Elfrida Heroina

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nueva Fortaleza se reúne cada 15 días en la Ciudadela Leonidas Proaño en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Elfrida, tiene 68 años de edad, hace algunos años su esposo falleció y quedo viuda pero de esta relación tuvo 3 hijos mayores de edad, una hija aun viven en su casa.
Doña Elfrida junto a su hija tienen  en su casa un pequeño taller de costura, allí ellas se dedican a confeccionar todo tipo de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, ellas tienen contratos con escuelas y colegios de la ciudad a los cuales les confeccionan los uniformes,  también con una fabrica local a quienes les proveen de uniformes, con esto tienen trabajo asegurado en varias épocas del año, también trabajan a base de pedidos de personas particulares. 
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar hilos, cierres, telas y otros materiales para la costura. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos siempre son de mucha ayuda, ella agradece a las personas que le ayudan a recibir sus créditos ya que así es como ella sale adelante. Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The Nueva Fortaleza Communal Bank meets every 15 days in the community of Leonidas Proaño in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches which are regularly visited throughout all seasons of the year, and for being a city of unparalleled beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where Doña Elfrida lives. She is 68 years old, and a few years ago her husband died, leaving her widowed. However, she has 3 children from the relationship who are grown up, with one daughter still living at home.

Doña Elfrida and her daughter have a small dressmaking workshop in their house. There, they produce all types of women's, men's, and children's clothing. They have contracts to sew uniforms for primary and secondary schools in the city, as well as a local factory. With this, they have guaranteed work at various times throughout the year. They also do individual orders.

This loan will be used to buy needles, zippers, thread, and other dressmaking materials. Doña Elfrida has been in the Communal Bank since its inception, and she likes it because the loans are always very helpful. She appreciates the people who assist her in obtaining her loans because that is how she prospers. Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to buy needles, zippers, thread, and other dressmaking materials.

loans.name: Msakuzi Group

texts.en:
Fransisca is married and has three children who are in school. She earns a living for her family by selling homecare products and operating a boda-boda, or motorbike taxi business. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. daily and is able to make an excellent monthly profit.

Fransisca has taken out and successfully repaid fifteen prior loans through Kiva's field partner Tujijenge Tanzania. Here she will be applying for 4,500,000 TZS to be divided between her two-member group. She and Esther will hold each other accountable for paying back this loan.

Fransisca will use her portion to buy more homecare products to sell. As in the past she will use her profits to cover school fees and food for the family.

Fransisca is always working to develop her business. She is very happy and thankful to everyone who has supported her.

loans.use: to buy more homecare products to sell.

loans.name: Beatriz Elizabeth

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Beatriz, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 24, 14 y 7 años de edad, los dos menores estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo se dedica al comercio.
Doña Beatriz realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice  en sus actividades, el tiene un deposito de venta de agua bidón, galones y botellas pequeñas de acuerdo a las necesidades de sus clientes, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 19h00 ya sea en su local o entregando por toda la ciudad en una camioneta que él tiene, lleva más de 7 años en este negocio con el cual él se gana el sustento de su familia. 
Este crédito lo va  a emplear para comprar agua en todas las variedades que vende. Es fundadora del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son de mucha ayuda para ellos. Sus sueños son que su familia goce de mucha salud.
texts.en:
The Las Divinas Loan Group meets every fortnight in the Tarqui neighborhood of the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches with many visitors all year round and for being a city of unsurpassed beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where 42-year-old Beatriz lives. She is married and from this relationship she has three children aged 24, 14 and 7. The two younger children study at high school and primary school. Her husband runs a business.

Dona Beatriz is requesting a loan so that her husband may use it in his business activities. He has a drinking water depot, selling water by the barrel, gallon or in small bottles, in accordance with his customers' needs. He works every day from 6:00am to 7:00pm either from his store or delivering water throughout the city in his van. He has been in this business for more than 7 years and through it he can earn a living to support his family. 

This loan will be used to buy water in all the varieties in which he sells it. Beatriz is the founder of the Loan Group and she likes it because the loans are very helpful. Her dreams are that her family will enjoy good health.

loans.use: to purchase water.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: ELLA ES UNA JOVEN SEÑORA CASADA QUE APOYA A SU ESPOSO TRABAJANDO COMO CAJERA PARA PODER SACAR ADELANTE A SUS PEQUEÑOS HIJOS, DE NIÑA DESGRACIADAMENTE SUS PADRES NO TUVIERON CUIDADO DE SU SALUD DENTAL Y ACTUALMENTE SU DENTADURA NO ES NADA AGRADABLE, SUS PIEZAS DENTALES ESTÁN EMPALMADAS LO QUE LE CAUSA PENA EN SU TRABAJO YA QUE TIENE TRATO CON CLIENTES. SU DESEO ES PODER TENER UN TRATAMIENTO DE ORTODONCIA, LAMENTABLEMENTE SUS INGRESOS SON POCOS.
texts.en:
She is a young woman who helps her husband by working as a cashier so that she can raise her small children.

As a child her parents unfortunately did not look after her dental health, and now her teeth are not pleasant to look at. Her teeth overlap, which causes her embarrassment at her work, as she deals with customers.

She wants to be able to have orthodontic treatment, but unfortunately her income is low.

loans.use: To pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, está estudiando la carrera de ciencias en la educación, y por medio de su carrera quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas que al igual que ella quieran aprender y salir adelante.
Maria está luchando y se está esforzando por poder ser alguien en la vida,  y comenta que está pidiendo este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Maria is from the city of Ybycuí. She is studying educational sciences, and through this job she would like to help other people who like her wish to learn and succeed.

Maria works hard and strives to make something of her life. She says that she is requesting this loan so that she can pay her university fees and thus continue to develop.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Yolanda Jaqueline

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Yolanda, tiene 51 años de edad, está separada y de esa relación tiene 5 hijos mayores de edad, actualmente tiene otro compromiso del cual no tiene hijos.
Doña Yolanda se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale en sus ratos libres a ofrecer sus productos ya que también trabaja de cocinera en un restaurante de la ciudad por lo cual recibe un sueldo mensual, ella allí también vende ya que sus jefes si le permiten, deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, lleva  más de 2 años  con esta actividad  la cual le ayuda a salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas y  otras prendas que vende. Lleva 5 años en el Grupo De Crédito le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The “Las Divinas” loan group meets every 15 days in the Tarqui neighborhood, in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, which have many visitors during all seasons of the year.  It is also known as a city with an unmatched beauty, with many tourist attractions.

Yolanda lives in this place.  She is 51 years old and separated.  From that relationship she has five adult children.  She is currently in another relationship, from which she has no children.

Yolanda works selling all types of clothing.  She sells door-to-door.  She goes out during her free moments to offer her products, since she also works as a cook in a restaurant in the city, for which she receives a monthly salary.  She also sells there since her bosses permit it.  She sells on credit and collects the payments every eight days.  She has been carrying out this business for more than two years, which helps her succeed.

This loan will be used to buy pants, shirts, blouses, and other garments that she sells.  She has been in the loan group for five years.  She likes it because of the help that the loans provide.  Her dreams are to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses, and other garments.

loans.name: Irene Marianel

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Irene, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 13, 10 y 4  años que estudian en colegio, escuela y jardín de infantes. Su esposo es comerciante, ella es de nacionalidad Peruana pero hace mas de 14 años se vino a esta ciudad por lo cual se considera una ecuatoriana de corazón.
Doña Irene junto a su marido arriendan un local en el centro de la ciudad en la cual venden productos naturales de todo tipo, tienen una gran variedades de medicinas naturales que son muy buenas y que sus clientes compran a diario para mejorar su salud,  trabajan de 8h00 a 18h00 todos los días siempre en compañía de su querido esposo, ella viaja hasta Perú lugar en el cual compra las medicinas. Lleva más de 14 años con este negocio el cual les permite salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar todo tipo de productos naturales. Lleva 2 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son tener un local propio.
texts.en:
The Las Divinas Loan Group meets every fortnight in the Tarqui neighborhood of the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches with many visitors all year round and for being a city of unsurpassed beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where 33-year-old Irene lives. She is married and from this relationship she has three children aged 13, 10 and 4 who study at high school, primary school and kindergarten. Her husband runs a business. She is Peruvian but came to this city more than 14 years ago, and as a result, she considers herself an Ecuadorian by heart.

Irene and her husband rent a store in the center of the city in which they sell all kinds of natural products. They stock a large range of natural medicines that are very good and that their customers buy everyday to improve their health. They work from 8:00am to 6:00pm everyday. She is always together with her beloved husband. She travels to Peru where she purchases the medicines. She has been in this business for more than 14 years and it has allowed them to get ahead. 

This loan is to buy a range of natural products. Irene has been involved in the Loan Group for 2 years and and she likes it because the loans are very helpful. Her dreams are to own her own store.

loans.use: to purchase natural products.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 24 años de edad  vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 3 años, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes establecidos, con las ganancias que obtiene puede salir adelante, el joven vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hijo, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas semillas, fertilizante y abono para seguir con su cultivo con el que espera mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia
texts.en:
The young man whose face is pixelated because he is 24 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, has been making a living growing corn and beans for the past 3 years. He sells his products in the surrounding towns, and he now has established customers. With the earnings that he obtains, he can move forward. 

The young man lives in his own house with his life companion and son. 

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of more seeds, fertilizer and manure to continue with his cultivations, with which he hopes to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more seeds, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Durgati Group

texts.en:
Durgati Group formed in the year 2015 at Karanpita village of Kalahandi district, Odisha, India. There are 10 active, self-dependent women with an objective for developing their existing businesses, as well as their livelihood. All the members of the concerned group have their own professions and businesses. 

Jharana is one of them who has taken a great role for her development and for the group members' source of revenue improvement. She is sitting in the front line of all the group members with her hand raised in the photo. She is about 25 years old and living with her small family consisting of her husband and two children.

Both wife and husband are engaged with a clothing shop at their own village, Karanpita, since the last 10 years. Through the concerned business, the monthly income of the family is 10,000 INR. In Jharana’s opinion, this amount is not at all sufficient to maintain her family, and hence, there are almost zero surpluses at the end of the month. 

She planned to improve her business with more investment, but the availability of funds is the main concern. So as a result, Jharana has applied for a loan for her group and got approved by Mahashakti. From this loan, she will purchase some modern clothing items as per the demand of the customers from the wholesale market. She hopes to get more and more profit from her business expansion and save money for the construction of her own house and to provide a high-class education to her children.

The other nine members of her group are also smart at their professions and are also actively engaged with different businesses like vegetable vending, a milk business, a rice business, tailoring, a popped rice business, a paddy business, a general store and a transport business. With this loan, they hope to heighten their livelihoods.

loans.use: to purchase some modern clothing items as per the demand of the customers

loans.name: Maa Chandi Group

texts.en:
In the year 2015, 11 self-dependent women of Bhatangpadar village of Kalahandi district, Odisha, India, formed a group named Maa Chandi. Almost all the members are very poor and belong to a scheduled tribe and scheduled caste families. Their main objective is to expand their existing business and develop their social livelihoods by taking a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. 

Chandra is the most active and energetic lady of the concerned village and has taken the leadership to form a self help group. The incredible lady’s aged about 31 years and is standing in the first row, second person from the right-hand side with a raised hand in the photo. She is a cheerful lady with high ambition. Her family consists of her husband and three children.

Since the last eight years, Chandra has engaged in a goat business with the help and support of her husband. She is very intelligent and has good experience in this profession. As the investment is small, she is unable to meet the customers' demand in time. However, she earns monthly income of 9,000 rupees from the occupation. 

But the present income is not sufficient to manage the business expenses as well as the household expenses for her family, so she decided to raise her income by increasing the volume of her business through a loan. She will purchase and maintain a lump sum stock of goats from the nearest market to maintain complete customer demand. Through this, Chandra hopes that this will definitely generate a handsome amount of extra income. She has a dream to save enough for the better education of her children. 

The other nine members of the group have also engaged themselves with different small businesses like food products, a fast food center, an egg business, vegetable vending, a bricks factory, a seasonal business, milk selling, a cycle store, a bookstore and fishery, etc.

loans.use: to purchase goats

loans.name: Savoeun's Group

texts.en:
Savoeun is age 44 years old. She is a married woman who lives with her family in Kampong Cham province. To overcome her family’s hardship, she grows rice as the main source of her family’s income and is harvesting rice on her co-villager’s farm as an additional source of income for her. 

Savoeun has been involved in these businesses for ages. Drought is the main challenge in her current business, which causes her to have not enough funds to do farming.

Now, Savoeun is leading a group of four to apply for a new Kiva loan via VisionFund, Kiva’s partner, and this is the fifth loan cycle for her. The previous loans provided a good impact of improving her family’s living and enabled her to earn about 36,000 KHR per day and save around 15,000 KHR each day. 

For this new loan, she will buy seeds and pesticides for doing farming in order to grow her output. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income and be able to buy a motorbike for her family’s use.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pesticides for doing farming in order to grow her output

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose is a policeman. Jose is very supportive of his son, and he hopes his son can be have a brighter future. So the loan of $800 is offered to Jose to send his son, Cipri, to university. He will use the loan to pay for registration and all materials for school.  

His child is not in this photo because his child is in school in the capital.

loans.use: to pay for registration and all materials for school for his son.

loans.name: Jamleh

texts.en:
Jamleh is a 36-year-old married woman from Yata, a village near Hebron city. She is a mother for three sons and three daughters. Her husband works as an employee in a local firm. Jamleh has a sewing workshop which has been open for the past eight years. She makes traditional and artistic pieces and sells them in the local market.
 
Jamleh would like to improve her business and expand it, so she decided to take a loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new sewing machine for her sewing workshop. 

Jamleh appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her sewing workshop.

loans.name: Yohanes

texts.en: Yohanes has been involved in business activities for a few year since he started with his own working capital of $2,000. Yohanes is requesting a loan of $1,500 to improve his business. He is selling gasoline and in addition, he can also fix motors. He is taking this loan because he wants to add to his principal amount to buy more gasoline and workshop tools. When Tuba Rai Metin offered the loan to him, he felt very happy because he can be improving his business.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and workshop tools.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en: Nargis is 36 old and the mother of four children. Her husband owns a small mobile shop in which he keeps a few mobile accessories. . But now for a couple of days, he is unable to buy the mobile accessories to earn profit. Therefore, Nargis has applied for the loan. She has to look after a huge family, taking care of each of her children, including their school fees, diet and health. For these purposes, she needs a large income and her husband is the only person who is responsible for bearing the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy mobile accessories for her husband's shop.

loans.name: Sheilo

texts.en: Sheilo, age 22, is married to a farmer and they're blessed with one child. She has owned and managed a retail store in her village for almost three years and earns a net income of PHP 2,500 daily. Due to insufficient capital in her business, she would like to avail a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase cooking oil, sugar, salt, coffee, canned goods, noodles, and beverages to sell. She's hoping that her store will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, sugar, salt, coffee, canned goods, noodles, and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.en:
Ana May is 18 years old and is fifth of seven children in the family. Her mother Soledad is a member of Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. and supports the family through her clothing retail business in the Philippines.

Ana May is studying for her Bachelor of Science in the Fishery Industry and is currently in the first of this four-year course.

Soledad is borrowing PHP 3,000 to pay for tuition fees for her daughter Ana May for the first semester of the school year 2015-16.

When she graduates, Ana May plans to be gainfully employed in the future.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Reema

texts.en:
Reema, a married woman with nine children, is 49 years old and lives in Salt. She is a conservative woman and asked her son Waleed to take her place in the photo.

Waleed is one of her children. He is 23 years old and studying Criminal Science. He is studying this major because he feels that it will help him to show his creativity and ideas. He is also working in a mini-market to help his parents with the household expenses.

Reema feels that her son Waleed will be someone important in the future and she cannot wait to see him in his graduation dress.

Because of the financial crises that Reema and her husband have been facing, she asked for an education loan to pay his semester fees and to buy his needed books.

loans.use: to pay for her son`s university fees.

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en:
Mwanaisha is married with five children, three of whom attend school. They live in their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She has operated a khanga (women's wrap cloth) selling business, selling from home and door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the lack of capital to expand her business.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of khangas for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of khangas for resale.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with five children and all go to school. She takes care of  additional family members. She operates a boutique of used clothes. She has been in this business for the last six years. She gets additional income from owning rental houses. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 1,000,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy bales of secondhand clothes. Her major challenge includes seasonality of used clothes. Her goal is to build more rental houses. 

Florence lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major expenses include school fees, food, and utilities.

loans.use: to buy a bale of used clothes.

loans.name: Heam's Group

texts.en: A local farmer located in the Mongkul Borey district of Banteay Meanchey province, Heam is 54 years old and a married mother of two children. Her main source of income is from her pig-farming business. Sometimes, she works for others for a fee to supplement her income. Her 34-year-old business can earn her just about 34,300KHR per day now because she has to spend some of her money to cure her sick pigs. Moreover, her pigs don't grow well so she cannot earn as good an income as before. She is now leading a two-member group to take out a new loan. In fact, this is not her first or second time, but it is the 10th time for her with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has repaid her past loans successfully. The previous loans helped her to have better living conditions and it allowed her to have enough household supplies to use. As a representative for this new loan, she will use her loan to buy piglets and pig feed to expand her pig-raising business. She hopes to earn more income to start a new business and improve her living standard so it is much better.

loans.use: to buy piglets and pig feed to expand her pig raising business.

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Waed

texts.en:
Waed is 21 years old and is studying for a degree in nursing. She lives in Mafraq with her family. She has eight siblings, and she is working really hard to get ahead and to grow.

Waed dreams of having a good job so that she can help to pay for her daily expenses and help her family with their household expenses,

She requested this loan to pay for her educational expenses so that she can continue her education, and achieve her dreams.

loans.use: To pay for her university fees

loans.name: Ghadeer

texts.en:
Ghadeer is a 24-year-old married woman with one daughter. She lives in Irbid.

Because of Ghadeer's marriage, she delayed her university studies by two years. Her child is now two years old, so now she can complete her education. However, her husband cannot cover her education fees. 

She doesn't want that to prevent her from achieving her dreams, so she has applied for an education loan to cover her university fees. She wants to achieve her dreams, and to become a productive woman who can find a good job to help her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: To pay for her university fees

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en:
Suriya is a 40-year-old woman, residing in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a mother of six children. Her husband has been running a crockery store for 4 years and he alone is responsible for feeding the entire family. 

Suriya is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan, because her husband has to purchase knives in bulk to resell. This loan will help her husband to purchase these items to resell. In this way, he can earn maximum profit and increase his daily sales. He can also use the profit amount as savings to cover future needs.

Suriya is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy knives in bulk for her husband to resell

loans.name: Waseem

texts.en:
Waseem is 21 years old and single, and he lives in Irbid. He is a student in university, majoring in accounting.

Waseem has a lot of dreams to achieve, and he has plans for after he graduates from university. 

However, his father cannot help him to pay for his education fees. Therefore he has asked for an education loan to help him cover his university fees.

loans.use: To cover his university fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a rickshaw for husband.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 5 cycle rickshaws.

loans.name: Ronald Marcelo

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Divinas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive don Ronald, tiene 38 años de edad, está casado y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 11 y 3  años de edad, el mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposa es ama de casa y le ayuda en su negocio.
El señor Ronald junto a su mujer se dedican a la venta de alimentos, ellos desde hace un año arrendaron un local en el centro de la ciudad donde instalaron un restaurante, sus ventas son muy buenas ya que su local está en un lugar muy concurrido y también por la sazón que le ponen a los paltos, allí ellos preparan deliciosos desayunos y almuerzos, siempre varían el menú lo cual les ha ayudado a ganar mas clientela con el paso de los días. De esta forma ellos logran sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Este crédito es para comprar mariscos de toda clase y víveres para preparar los alimentos. Lleva 3 ciclos  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los crédito siempre le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son tener un local propio y no pagar arriendos.
texts.en:
The "Las Divinas" loan group meets every fortnight in the Tarqui barrio of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches that are popular throughout the year. Manta, with many tourist attraction, has a beauty that is unbeatable.

And it is here that 38-year-old Ronald lives. He is married and has two children, ages 11 and 3 years old, the eldest of whom is in school. Ronald's wife is a housewife and helps at Ronald's business.

Ronald and his wife make a living selling meals. They have now been renting premises in the city centre where they have opened a restaurant. Sales are good as the restaurant is in an area with a lot of passers-by and their meals are very tasty. Ronald and his wife prepare and sell delicious breakfasts and lunches. They vary their menu as this helps them to attract more customers. This restaurant helps Ronald and his wife to support their children.

This loan will be used to buy all sorts of seafood and supplies to prepare meals. Ronald has been with the loan group for three cycles and likes it because the loans are a great help. Ronald's dream is to own his own premises and not pay rent.

loans.use: to buy seafood and supplies.

loans.name: Gerson

texts.es:
Gerson esta luchando y se esta esforzando para poder ser una buena profesional y servir a las demás personas por medio de su profesión, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder pagar la matricula de su carrera y de esa forma poder continuar con sus estudios.
Hoy pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder pagar de vuelta su matricula, y de esa forma estar adelante en sus estudios, luchando por cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Gerson is working hard in order to be a good professional and help others through his work. He says that he used his previous loan to pay university matriculation fees and was thus able to continue funding his studies.

Gerson is applying for another loan in order to pay his latest matriculation fees and continue with his studies. He is working hard to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to pay matriculation fees.

loans.name: Trinita

texts.es: TRINITA: Es una señora cordial y sonriente, pertenece a la etnia miskita, originaria de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Está casada con 4 hijos en edad escolar. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos y contribuir con los gastos del hogar y educación de sus hijos, desde hace 15 años vende ropa usada y calzados de Masaya, en un tramo que tiene en uno de los mercados de Bilwi. Solicita financiamiento para comprar en Managua una paca de ropa mixta y en Masaya calzados, para venderlos a precios accesibles a su clientela en Bilwi e incrementar sus ingresos.  Ella sueña con ser una comerciante exitosa.
texts.en:
Trinita is a polite and happy woman. She is of Miskito ethnicity, and originally from Bilwi in the Puerto Cabezas municipality. She is married and has four school-aged children.

In order to earn her own source of income and help with the cost of running her household and her children's education, Trinita has been selling used clothing and footwear from Masaya at Bilwi market for 15 years.

Trinita is applying for a loan in order to buy clothes in Managua and footwear in Masaya and sell them on at affordable prices to her customers in market. She can thus increase her income. Trinita dreams of being a successful trader.

loans.use: to buy clothes in Managua and footwear in Masaya.

loans.name: Mamy

texts.fr:
Mamy est une paysanne, dynamique de 33 ans. Elle est mariée, mère de 3 enfants et possède une petite maison à la campagne. Elle exerce toute sorte de culture et d’élevage, ce qui lui permet de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
Elle est parmi les premiers emprunteurs de Vahatra dans son quartier. En effet, cela fait 5 ans qu’elle est emprunteuse chez Vahatra et avec les bénéfices des prêts précédents, elle a pu acheter une rizière où elle cultive du riz chaque année. Elle a aussi une vache laitière et avec ce 9ème prêt, elle compte acheter une autre vache laitière pour augmenter le revenu familial. 
Mamy  a comme objectif l’autonomie financière, elle préfère injecter les bénéfices des prêts dans la culture et l’élevage.
texts.en:
Mamy is a dynamic, 33-year-old farmer. She is married and the mother of 3 children, and she owns a little house in the countryside. She cultivates all kinds of produce and breeds all kinds of livestock, which enables her to meet her family's needs.

She was one of the first people in her district to become a Vahatra borrower. Indeed, she has been a Vahatra borrower for 5 years and, thanks to the profits earned through previous loans, has been able to buy a rice paddy where she grows rice every year. She also has a dairy cow and, using this 9th loan, plans to buy another in order to increase the family's income.

Mamy's goal is to achieve financial self-sufficiency and she prefers to inject her profits back into her farming and livestock business.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Murongo Group

texts.fr: Héritée de mes parents, je me suis lancée dans la riziculture en 1991 et j'ai fini par comprendre avec le temps que c'est la meilleure activité agricole, nous dit Petit. Cette culture lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins familiaux; même si elle connaît un certain déséquilibre dû au manque de moyen, aux difficultés liées à l'écoulement (marché), aux maladies et parfois aux contraintes climatiques. Petit souhaite renforcer au mieux l'éducation de ses enfants et leur assurer une bonne alimentation grâce aux revenus émanant de cette activité. Membre du groupe MURONGO, il tient dans sa main un carnet rose.
texts.en:
Petit inherited his land from his parents. He went into business as a rice farmer in 1991 and, over time, came to understand that it is the best type of farming activity. His farming enables him to meet his family's needs, even though his family suffers from a certain disequilibrium because of a lack of means, difficulties associated with the flow of goods in the markets, illness and occasionally, unfavourable weather conditions.

Petit wants to use the income from his business to ensure his children's education and to make sure that they enjoy a healthy diet.

A member of the Murongo group, he is holding a pink booklet.

loans.use: to pay the manual labour needed for transplantation and weeding, and to buy phytosanitary products and fertiliser.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy starch, cheese, cornflour etc.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito 12 De Octubre se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Gabriel  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Mariana, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 23, 21  y 17 años de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Mariana  es una mujer que le gusta trabajar por el bien familiar, ella tiene un puesto en el cual vende manzanas acarameladas, estas manzanas son muy solicitadas por los niños ya que son manzanas bañadas en caramelo, ella trabaja los fines de semana y en feriados que es cuando más vende. Ya son más de 12 años que lleva realizando esta labor la cual le permite salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar manzanas, azúcar y palitos de madera. Esta casi desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños es tener un buen local y lo mejor para su familia.
texts.en:
The "12 De Octubre" Communal Bank meets every fortnight in the San Gabriel district in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches which have many visitors all through the year and for being a city of unrivalled beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where 37-year-old Mariana lives. She is married and from this relationship she has three children aged 23, 21 and 17 years. One of them still lives at home. Her husband works in business. Mariana is a woman who likes to work for the good of the family. She has a stall where she sells toffee apples. These apples are very popular with the children as they are apples dipped in caramel. She works at the weekends and on holidays, which is when she sells the most. She has been doing this work for more than 12 years now and this has allowed her to make progress in life. 

She will use this loan to buy apples, sugar and wooden sticks. She has been in the Communal Bank almost since the beginning and she likes it because the loans are quick and are a great help. Her dream is to have a good sales outlet and for her family to have the best.

loans.use: to buy apples, sugar and wooden sticks.

loans.name: San José Group

texts.es:
El comité SAN JOSÉ,  es un grupo fortalecido y antiguo, la integran 17 mujeres humildes y trabajadoras, se encuentran en el 4to ciclo y manifiestan su entusiasmo por seguir trabajando dentro del programa de comité de mujeres.
La Sra. Anuncia, integrante de este comité, que gracias al trabajo solidario y cooperativo, está logrando su independencia. Ella se dedica a la venta de menudencias que ella misma se encarga de vender de manera ambulante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar menudencias para poder vender y de esa forma seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The SAN JOSÉ committee is a strong and established group which is made up of 17 modest and hard-working women. They are now in their fourth loan cycle and demonstrate their enthusiasm to continue working within the women's committee programme.

Anuncia is a member of the committee and thanks to the supportive and co-operative work she is achieving her independence. She makes a living selling giblets which she herself is responsible for selling as a street vendor. 

She is asking for this loan so she can buy giblets to sell and so continue with her work as she has been doing. She is grateful for the opportunity she is getting to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy giblets to sell.

loans.name: Katherine Yassenia

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito 12 De Octubre se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Gabriel  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Katherine, tiene 23 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 8 y 6 años que estudian en escuela. Su esposo trabaja ocasionalmente.
Doña Katherine es una mujer muy trabajadora  que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto solventar los gastos del hogar tiene un negocio de venta de útiles escolares, a pesar de que recién tiene un año sus ventas son muy buenas allí sus clientes encuentran cuadernos, plumas, papel para papelografos, marcadores y también ofrece el servicio de copiado, sus casa está cerca de un centro educativo lo cual es bueno para sus ventas, allí también vende colas, aguas y ciertas golosinas lo cual le dejan ganancias extra que en conjunto le dejan lo necesario para salir adelante y solventar los gastos ya que su marido no trabaja con frecuencia.
Este crédito es para comprar cuadernos, hojas para la copiadora, marcadores entre otros. Lleva 3 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio.  Sus sueños son tener una gran papelería.
texts.en:
The communal bank "12 De Octubre" meets every fortnight in the district of San Gabriel in Manta. This city is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited throughout the year and also as a really lovely city in its own right that can boast many tourist attractions. Katherine, who is 23 and married, lives here. Her children are aged 8 and 6 and they attend school. Her husband is able to find occasional work.

Katherine is very hard-working and runs her own business selling educational supplies so she can cover their household expenses. Although she has only been running her business for one year, her sales are going well. She offers her customers a photocopying service as well as items such as notebooks, pens, flip-chart paper and felt-tip markers. Her house is located near an educational centre, which is good for her sales. She also sells colas, water and various kinds of sweets there. This provides her with extra profit, and means that she is able to get ahead and earn enough to cover the household costs, which is important as her husband is only able to find occasional work.

Katherine is asking for a loan to buy items such as notebooks, photocopy paper and felt-tip pens. She has been a member of the communal bank for 3 years, and she likes it because it was through one of their loans that she set up her business. Her dream is to have a large stationery store.

loans.use: to buy items such as notebooks, photocopy paper and felt-tip pens.

loans.name: Pastor Buenaventura

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito 12 De Octubre se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Gabriel  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive don Pastor, tiene 62 años de edad, está casado y de esta relación tiene seis hijos mayores  de edad, tres de ellos aun viven en su casa. Su esposa es costurera.
El señor Pastor es un hombre  muy luchador que siempre le ha gustado trabajar para así con sus ganancias sacar  adelante a su familia, el se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado, casi todos los días el se desplaza a la playa de la localidad donde compra el mejor pescado directo de los pescadores para luego vender ya sea al por mayor o por libras en la ciudad donde tiene sus clientes,  llevan más de 40 años con este negocio el cual siempre ha sido su forma de ganarse la vida.
Este crédito es para comprar pescado para la venta. Lleva 4 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son tener salud y seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
The "12 De Octubre" Communal Bank meets every fortnight in the San Gabriel district in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches which have many visitors all through the year and for being a city of unrivalled beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where 62-year-old Pastor lives. He is married and from this relationship he has six grown-up children. Three of them still live with him. His wife is a seamstress. Pastor is a very determined man who has always enjoyed working so that in this way he can bring his family up with his profits. He makes a living buying and selling fish. Almost every day he goes to the local beach where he buys the best fish directly from the fishermen to then sell, whether wholesale or by the pound in the city where he has his customers. He has had this business for more than 40 years and it has always been his means of earning a living.

This loan is to buy fish to sell. He has been in the Communal Bank for 4 years and he likes it because the loans help him a great deal. His hope for the future is to be healthy and continue working.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Tutakula Kwa Jasho Group

texts.fr: Avec L'influence de sa belle-famille, Riziki s'est engagée à cultiver le riz depuis 1976. Elle a été aidée par son époux et les parents à aimer cette activité car elle lui procure plus de profit que de peine; elle est la seule activité de sa communauté. Souvent, elle est perturbée par le manque de financement, la baisse du prix sur le marché et le bouleversement saisonnier. Elle est toutefois confiante que dans un futur proche, ils auront à récolter beaucoup de sacs et à minimiser les charges grâce à l'appui de la PAIDEK; leurs enfants auront à étudier et devenir intellectuels. Président du groupe MURONGO, elle tient sur la photo un carnet rose.
texts.en:
Inspired by her in-laws, Riziki started farming rice in 1976. She was helped by her husband and relatives to like farming because it brings more benefits than troubles; hers is the only business in her community. She is often troubled by a lack of funds, lower market prices and seasonal disruptions. However, she is confident that, in the near future, they will have many bags worth of produce to harvest and will have minimised their costs thanks to the support of PAIDEK. Their children will be able to get an education and become scholars.

The leader of the Murongo group, Riziki is holding a pink booklet in the picture.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser, seeds, and phytosanitary products, and to pay the wages of the labourers needed for the weeding and harvest.

loans.name: Barrio Cruce Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Barrio Cruce forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza como un medio de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias. Este programa les permitirá salir de la pobreza en la que se encuentran.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Gloria, quien tiene una modesta peluquería en la que todos los días trabaja, con esto tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y darles una buena calidad de vida, para que no les falte nada y no pasen por necesidades.
Pide este préstamo para poder surtirse con shampoos, enjuagues, tintes, cremas, y otros insumos que le permita poder seguir dando a sus clientes un buen servicio como el que viene dando.
texts.en:
The group called Barrio Cruce is taking part in the poverty elimination programme as a means of being able to improve their own and their families' living conditions. This programme allows them to get out of the poverty which they find themselves in. 

One of the members is Gloria, who has a modest hairdressing salon where she works every day. Through this she has the means to be able to help her family and give them a good quality of life so that they do not lack anything or suffer any hardships.

She is asking for this loan so she can stock up with shampoos, rinses, colours, creams and other supplies which will allow her to continue giving her clients good service just as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy shampoos, rinses, colours, creams and other supplies.

loans.name: Ikhbol

texts.ru: Ихболу 58 лет. Она жительница не большого славного района Вахш. Ихбол проживает вместе с сыном, невесткой и тремя внуками. Несмотря на свой возраст, она не устает играть и уделять большое время своим внукам. И плюс к этому Ихбол активная работает на поле. Вот уже 15 лет Ихбол занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Она каждый год сажает урожай, и этот год не стал исключением. Она посадила урожай, и осталось только обработать землю минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить плодотворный результат (урожай). Ихбол для этого обратилась за кредитом. Она намерена приобрести минеральные удобрения и сразу приступить к работе.
texts.en:
Ikhbol is 58 years old. She lives in the small, pleasant area Vakhsh. Ikhbol lives with her son, daughter-in-law and three grandchildren. In spite of her age, she is never tired of playing with and devoting a lot of time to her grandchildren. In addition to this, Ikhbol actively works in the fields. 

Ikhbol has cultivated crops for 15 years. She plants crops every year, and this year was no exception. She has planted the crops, and all that remains is to work the fields with mineral fertilisers in order to get fruitful results from the crops. 

Ikhbol has applied for a loan for this. She intends to obtain mineral fertilisers and immediately begin work.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilisers in order to obtain a fruitful harvest.

loans.name: Benkadi Kamagasso Group

texts.fr: Sanata est celle qui tient la calebasse en main sur la photo. Sanata est membre du groupe Benkadi, marié et mère de  2 enfants âgé de 15 à 27 ans, elle est analphabète, réside  au Mali, âgés de 42 ans. Elle fait le commerce des arachides. Les rêves et les espoirs de  Sanata est d’avoir plus d’argent pour augmenter son stock d’arachide, enfin  de tirer plus de bénéfice pour subvenir aux besoins familiale a tout temps. Par manque de moyen financier elle fait recourt au RMCR pour pouvoir mener son activité. Elle s’approvisionne et vend ses produits dans les foires hebdomadaires de sa zone. Elle  gagne comme bénéfice 10 000 FCFA par mois. Le prêt apportera une amélioration aux besoins de sa famille : santé, nourriture etc., depuis 15 ans elle fait le commerce d’arachide décortiqués. Les obstacles auxquels se heurte  Sanata est souvent la chute des prix.
texts.en:
Sanata is the one holding the gourd in the picture.

Sanata is a member of the Benkadi group. She is married and the mother of 2 children aged 15 and 27. She is illiterate, 42 years old and lives in Mali. She sells groundnuts. Sanata's hopes and dreams include having more money in order to increase her inventory of groundnuts, so that she can increase her profits and always meet her family's needs.

Lacking funds, she is turning to RMCR in order to be able to continue her business activities. She buys and sells her products at the weekly markets in her zone. She makes a profit of 10 000 francs a month. This loan will enable her to better meet her family's needs (health, nutrition, etc.). She has been selling shelled groundnuts for 15 years. One of the challenges Sanata often faces is falls in market prices.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts for resale.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.ru: Зайнаб, 58 лет, вдова, мать 5 детей. Образование- среднее. Около 35 лет она занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодняшний день бизнес достаточно развит. У Зайнаб в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, 20 овец, на 2,55 Га земли она выращивает кукурузу и клевер. Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет до 8,800 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь и содержание семьи, поэтому Зайнаб обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса и мечтает накопить на постройку дома.
texts.en:
Zainab is 58 years old, widowed, and has five children. She has secondary education. She has worked in animal and field husbandry for about 35 years. 

Today, her business is sufficiently developed. Zainab has four cows and twenty sheep on her farm. On 2.55 hectares of land, she cultivates corn and clover. 

Her monthly income today is about 8,800 som (KGS). These means are not sufficient for a respectable life or supporting her family. Thus, Zainab has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS), to buy livestock for fattening up and resale. 

She plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further expansion of her business, and dreams of saving to build a house.

loans.use: to buy some livestock for fattening and resale in order to increase her income.

loans.name: Mary Monserrate

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito 12 De Octubre se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Gabriel  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Mary, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 26 y 8 años  de edad, ambos aun viven en su casa y el menor estudian en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca. Ella hace varios años aprendió corte y confecciona en una academia de la ciudad
Doña Mary desde hace más de 15 años instaló un pequeño taller de costura en su casa, allí ella confecciona todo tipo de prendas pero de preferencia de damas y niños, en ocasiones elabora uniformes de escuelas, colegios y empresas. Trabaja todos los días unas seis horas  dependiendo de lo que tenga que confeccionar. Gracias a sus ganancias han logrado estudiar a sus hijos. 
Este crédito lo va  emplear en comprar telas, cierres, hilos y otros materiales para la  costura. Lleva más 3  años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos sale adelante. Sus sueños son  seguir mejorando todos los días.
texts.en:
El Grupo De Crédito 12 De Octubre [October 12th Credit Group] meet every fortnight in the neighbourhood of San Gabriel, in the city of Manta. Manta is known for its beautiful beaches which are popular with visitors throughout the year, and for being a uniquely beautiful city with many tourist attractions. 

This is where Mary lives, who is 45 and married. She has two children from this relationship who are 26 and 8 years old and both live at home. The youngest is at school. Her husband is a fisherman. Several years ago she learned the art of dressmaking at an academy in the city.

Over 15 years ago Mary set up a small dressmaking workshop in her house. Here she makes all kinds of clothing but above all she likes making clothes for women and children. She sometimes makes school uniforms and business uniforms. She works every day for six hours, depending on what she has to sew. Thanks to her earnings she has been able to send her children to school.  

She is going to use this loan to buy fabric, fasteners, thread and other sewing materials. She has been with this credit group for three months and she likes it because with the loans she is moving forward. She dreams of continuing to improve every day.

loans.use: to buy fabric, fasteners, thread and other sewing materials

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
El comité San Miguel se encuentra en el séptimo ciclo. El grupo se formó en la ciudad de Santaní. El grupo está conformado por 17 integrantes todas con actividades independientes.
La señora  Rita, trabaja desde su propia casa donde tiene una despensa muy bien surtida, cuenta con mucha clientela debido a su buena atención. Este negocio lo emprendió después de haber ingresado al programa de comité de mujeres. Comenta que le va muy bien y esta muy contenta de pertenecer al comité San Miguel.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas, como ser: verduras, carne, frutas, productos en suelto y otros, para poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
The San Miguel committee is in its seventh loan cycle. The group formed in the city of Santaní and is made up of 17 members who all have their own occupations.

Rita works from her own home where she has a very well-stocked small grocery store. She has a large clientele due to her excellent service. She launched the business after joining the women's committee programme. She says that she is doing very well and she is very happy to belong to the San Miguel committee.

She is asking for this loan to be able to buy supplies to continue with her sales, such as: vegetables, meat, fruit, bulk items and other products.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, fruit, bulk items and other consumables.

loans.name: Oyniso

texts.ru: Ойнисо жительница города Вахдат. Ей 31 год, она  замужем и мать двоих замечательных детей. Несмотря на то, что школу она окончила с хорошими оценками, в силу семейных обстоятельств в университет поступить она не смогла. У Ойнисо есть оборудование по переработки хлопка, который достался ей от отца, и вот на протяжении уже 8 лет она занимается этим ремеслом. Оборудование, на котором работает Ойнисо уже давно устарело и нуждается в ремонте. Ойнисо  для покупки нового оборудования требуется денежные средства, которых у нее, к сожалению не достаточно. Она просит помощь на приобретение кредита на покупку и ремонт оборудования.
texts.en:
Oyniso lives in Vakhdat city. She is 31 years old, married, and has two wonderful children. In spite of finishing school with good grades, on account of family circumstances, she was unable to go to university. Oyniso has equipment for cotton processing, which was passed down to her from her father, and she has been engaged in this trade for the past eight years. 

The equipment which Oyniso works with has long become antiquated and is in need of repairs. Oyniso requires a funds to buy new equipment, and unfortunately she does not have enough. She asks for help with acquiring a loan to buy and repair her equipment.

loans.use: to buy and repair equipment.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: ISABEL: Es una mujer sonriente y luchadora de  33 años de edad, pertenece a la etnia Miskita, originaria de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Madre soltera de 2 hijos: El mayor de 7 años de edad estudia su segundo grado de primaria y una pequeña de 5 años de edad. Solicita financiamiento para comprar su propio terreno y poco a poco iniciar la construcción de su vivienda de tambo y madera, actualmente habita en casa de familiares. Su sueño es tener una vivienda digna y segura.
texts.en:
Isabel is a smiley and determined 33-year-old woman. She belongs to the Miskita ethnic group and comes from the town of Bilwi, Puerto Cabezas. She is a single mother to two children: her 7-year-old son who is studying in second grade at primary school and her little 5-year-old daughter. 

She is asking for financial help to buy her own land so she can gradually begin to construct her wooden stilt house. At the moment she lives with relatives. 

Her dream is to have a respectable and safe home.

loans.use: to buy her own land.

loans.name: Py Renda Group

texts.es:
19 son las mujeres que integran este grupo llamado Py Renda, están dentro del programa de comités de mujeres y también dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Juliana, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que está en una pobreza extrema, Entre el trabajo que ella hace comenta que se dedica a  la venta de Comidas, Gaseosa,  y otros productos. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que se esmera y quiere salir adelante, es por ello que se esfuerza para poder mejorar.
La Sra. Juliana Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de Carne, Gaseosa y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y mas venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
There are 19 women that make up the group called Py Renda, which is part of the women's committee programme and also the programme to eliminate poverty, fighting to improve their quality of life.

One of the members is Juliana, who in the last survey showed a level of poverty at level one, which means that she is in extreme poverty. Among the work that she does she says that she sells food, soft drinks and other products. She is a very hard-working person that goes to a lot of effort and wants to get ahead. This is why she is striving to improve.

Juliana is asking for this loan to be able to buy meat, soft drinks and other products which will help her to obtain more output and sales to help her improve her income.

loans.use: to buy meat, soft drinks and other products.

loans.name: Constance

texts.fr: Constance est une femme divorcée et âgée de 45 ans qui habite à Adidogomé. Constance vit seule et travaille activement pour son épanouissement. Pour trouver son revenu, Constance vend des casseroles et des objets plastiques exposés son quartier. Constance s’approvisionne trois fois par mois et demande ce crédit pour commander des casseroles.
