Durdana is a 36-year-old married woman. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. Some years ago she started her business of tailoring to help run her household activities. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses. 

She has now requested a loan of 35,000 PKR to purchase more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles, and scissors for stitching more dresses to get a boost in her earnings. She wishes to spend it on providing a better quality of life to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles, and scissors for stitching more dresses

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
RAZIA is age 36; she is a mother of two children and living in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been running a general store where he sells rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap, biscuits, etc. He manages his household necessities from his own store.  His relatives also like to purchase from his general store. 

He speaks with an even tone, which is impressive, and he easily wins the trust of others. Due to his behavior and tone, he has built up very good relations with his customers. His general store is very famous in the town, and that is the reason his business runs well. Due to good relations his sales have increased a lot, but he does not have sufficient stock to cope with the demand. 

Therefore, RAZIA requested a loan for her husband so that he can buy more stock of wheat, rice, flour, pulses, soaps, shampoo, detergents, biscuits, etc. RAZIA hopes that her husband will utilize the loan in a positive way; this amount will help him to cope with the demands of her family. 

RAZIA thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more stock of wheat, rice, flour, pulses, soaps, shampoo, detergents and biscuits for her husband's general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank and a toilet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank and a toilet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation their family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, metal sheeting, and wood to construct the kitchen of her house.

loans.name: Novruz

texts.en:
Novruz is 22 years old, single, and a gardener. He is a refugee and lives with his parents in IDP settlement. The main source of income for his family is raising and selling seasonal vegetables (cucumber, onion, greens, etc.). This brings him 180 AZN monthly, and he also gets additional earnings working as a butcher in his free time.

Raising vegetables is very popular in Azerbaijan because people have high demand for fresh vegetables. They use these products to prepare delicious fresh salads and national dishes. 

Novruz ’s parents are old and they need good care but this isn’t possible with a small income. So Novruz wants to increase productivity and income, and provide his parents with a good life, because it’s very hard for refugees to pay for medicines. He applied for 1,200 AZN in order to buy new good fertilizers and garden tools.

loans.use: to buy new good fertilizers and garden tools.

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en:
Dennis is 29 years old and he supports two children. He has been offering motorcycle transport services for the last four years and the business earns him KES 10,000 per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase motorcycle spare parts such as engine, tyres and mirrors for repair and maintenance so as to offer better and faster transport services. 

He plans to use the gained profit to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and to educate his children. His hope is to expand his business sector through purchasing more motorcycles for transport services.

loans.use: To purchase motorcycle spare parts such as engine, tyres and mirrors for repair and maintenance so as to offer better and faster transport services.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is aged 30 years, and he supports one child. He has been a farmer for the last 5 years and the business earns him KES 5,000 per month. 

He has applied for his first of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer for top dressing his crops for a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus in the market. 

He plans to use the gained profit to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and to educate his child. His hope is to expand his business and educate his child to a higher level of education.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer for top dressing his crops for a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus in the market.

loans.name: Karisa

texts.en:
Karisa is a married man with 10 children, all of whom attend school. He lives at his own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

He has operated a butcher shop business for the past 40 years, selling goat meat. He faces a major challenge of transportation in his place of operation.

With the loan he is requesting, he wants to purchase goats to slaughter and get meat for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase goats to slaughter and get meat for resale.

loans.name: Shafqat

texts.en:
Shafqat is a 59-year-old married woman. She deals in selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales

loans.name: Leonor Dinora

texts.es: Leonor de 41  años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura (siembra maíz y frijol) desde hace 8 años y también a la  crianza de pollo de engordes desde hace 5 años, gracias a su trabajo y a la ayuda de su esposo es como pueden salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, herbicidas etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: 41-year-old Leonor lives in her own house with her husband and three children. She has made a living from agriculture (she grows maize and beans) for eight years. She has also been breeding broiler chickens for five years. Thanks to her work and her husband’s help, she has managed to cover the household expenses. She is requesting a loan so she can buy compost, fertilisers, seeds, herbicides, and other things and improve the piece of land shown in the photograph in order to continue with her work and obtain better earnings.

loans.use: to improve her piece of land and buy compost, fertilisers, seeds, herbicides, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing his crops, so as to enable him to get a better harvest for family use, and sell the surplus in the market.

loans.name: Yeab's Group

texts.en:
Yeab, 42, lives with family members in a rural village of the Kampong Cham province. She is the mother of one child. She earns income to support her family condition via rice cropping and pig raising. Moreover, she can earn more income via working for others for a fee. She has been involved in this business for 23 years. She can earn income of about 43,000 KHR per day and she can save around 24,000 KHR each day from her business. 

This is Yeab's second time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid back her past loan. Her past loan improved her family’s living. She leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will use her entire loan portion to pay for a plowing fee, and buy fertilizer and pig feed. She hopes that she can get more yield than last year.

loans.use: to pay for a plowing fee, and buy fertilizer and pig feed

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Sindy Del Carmen

texts.es:
Sindy,  de 26 años de edad,  solo posee estudios de educación básica debido a que no pudo continuar con sus estudios; actualmente vive con sus padres, se encuentra soltera y no tiene hijos.

Sindy ayuda a su padre a trabajar los cultivos de maíz y frijol ya que es hija única y su padre le ha brindado la confianza para que realice dicha actividad, que también le gusta mucho la agricultura.

Puesto que ya tiene mucha experiencia en la actividad ha decidido trabajar una hectárea más por su propia cuenta para esta actividad es que necesita el dinero del crédito.

El sueño de Sindy es ayudar a su padre en la siembra de los granos, ya que es de avanzada edad, también sueña con prepararse para brindarle a sus hijos una vida digna.
texts.en:
Sindy, who is 26 years old, has only a basic education, since she was not able to continue with her studies. She now lives with her parents. She is single and has no children.

Sindy helps her father work in the corn and bean plantings, since she is the only daughter, and her father has given her the confidence to do this work. She also likes agriculture very much.

Since she already has a lot of experience in this work, she has decided to work an additional hectare on her own. It is for this work that she needs the money from the loan.

Sindy's dream is to help her father in the planting of the grains, since he is elderly. She also dreams of preparing herself to offer her children a dignified life.

loans.use: to buy corn and beans for planting and to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Faiz

texts.en: Faiz is a 61-year-old widowed woman. She is a mother of four children. To meet her household expenses, she has started her business of animal sales and purchase. She earns a good amount of income to contribute to the family income. Now she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. She aspires to save money to provide her children with a prosperous future.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy silk, German, and mish thread to make traditional clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom at her home to improve access to sanitation and water sources.

loans.name: Concepcion De Maria

texts.es:
Concepción de 38 años de edad, es luchadora y emprendedora, ella vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos ellos están pequeños su esposo trabaja en la tierra y le ayuda con los niños y ella se dedica a la venta de comida

ella se dedica a la venta de platos típicos en su casa ella vende toda variedad de comida así como papas fritas, pasteles, yuca frita, tostadas y empanadas, se ha dedicado a eso durante varios  años y asegura que gracias a ello ha logrado sacar a su familia adelante.

Concepción utilizara el préstamo para poder comprar otra freidora, ya que por medio de ella, puede hacer crecer su negocio,

Concepción sueña con sacar a sus hijos adelante, mejorar sus condiciones económicas y así poder darles una mejor vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Concepción is a determined and entrepreneurial 38-year-old.  She lives with her husband and two young children.  Her husband works the land and helps with the children, and she works selling food.

Concepción makes a living selling traditional dishes out of her home. She sells a wide variety of foods, such as french fries, cakes, fried cassava, tostadas, and empanadas. She has done this work for several years, and is sure that it is the reason she has been able to keep her family moving forward.

She will use the loan to buy another deep fryer, which will enable her to grow her business. 

Concepción dreams of getting her children ahead by improving their economic conditions, thereby giving them a better life.

loans.use: to buy a deep-fryer.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es: Susana tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa humilde pero de su propiedad  y se dedica a la venta de variedad de frutas y hojas de banano (hoja utilizada para hacer tamales). De esta forma es como logra mantener la economía del hogar y ganarse el pan de cada día. Susana  es una mujer muy conocida en su localidad como una persona íntegra, responsable y trabajadora la cual pone en primer plano su bienestar personal. Susana anteriormente obtuvo un crédito con el fin de reparar el techo y el piso de la vivienda  pero dicho crédito solo le alcanzo para el encementando de piso por lo que con el deseo de cumplir su otro objetivo que es el de cambiar el techo de la casa vuelve a solicitar un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para comprar lamina, clavos y madera y de esa forma poder continuar con las mejoras que consiste en cambiar  el techo de su hogar el cual se  encuentra bastante deteriorado.
texts.en: Susana is 54 years old. She lives in a modest house that she owns. She makes a living by selling fruit and banana leaves (the leaves are used to make tamales). In this way, she manages to look after the household finances and earn her daily bread. Susana is known in the area as a responsible and hard-working person of integrity who puts her personal well-being first. Susana previously obtained a loan with the goal of repairing the roof and floor of her home, but it was only enough to pay for the cement for the floor; for this reason, she is requesting another loan from FUSAI so she can accomplish her other goal (changing the roof of the house). She will use the loan to buy metal sheets, nails, and wood so she can continue with the improvements she is making to her house, which consist of changing the roof of her home as it is quite deteriorated.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, nails, and wood for changing the roof of her home

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es:
Rosa, de 40 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijos y su esposo, dos de sus hijos ya trabajan uno está acompañado y el más pequeño va a la escuela, vive con su esposo él se dedica a la agricultura y es líder de su iglesia.

Rosa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, y también ayuda a su esposo con los trabajos de la milpa, trabajo que ha realizado desde pequeña.

Ella necesita el crédito para poder comprar los insumos que necesitan para su milpa y de esa manera obtener una muy buena cosecha.

El sueño de Rosa es sacar a sus hijos adelante, que vivan una vida digna y  llena de alegría.
texts.en:
Rosa is 40 years old. She lives with her three children as well as her husband. Two of her children work, one is in a relationship, and the youngest is in school. Her husband makes a living in agriculture, and he is the leader of his church. Rosa performs household chores. She also helps her husband work the corn field, a labor that she has been performing since she was young.

She is requesting a loan to buy the supplies that she needs for the corn field. This way, she will obtain a very good harvest. Rosa dreams of moving her children forward and of ensuring that they live a decent life that is full of happiness.

loans.use: to buy the supplies that she needs for her corn field.

loans.name: Rosa Idis

texts.es:
Rosa, de 38 años de edad, está acompañada y su compañero de vida vive en Estados Unidos y trabaja en construcción, ella se dedica a la agricultura y tiene tres hijos que están en la escuela.

Rosa, siembra maíz desde que tiene 16 años de edad, aprendió con sus padres y luego con su esposo; cuando su esposo estaba en El Salvador, ella se dedicaba al trabajo agrícola en el campo; ahora sus cultivos están a 2 kilómetros desde su vivienda, sus hijos cuando no están en la escuela le ayudan en el trabajo, ella se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para preparar el desayuno a sus hijos.

El crédito sera invertido para comprar fertilizantes y foleares para la siembra de maíz.

El sueño de Rosa, es que sus hijos sean profesionales y también sueña con volver a ver a su esposo.
texts.en:
Rosa is 38 years old. Her partner lives in the United States and works in construction. Rosa makes a living from agriculture. She has three children who are at school. Rosa has been growing maize since she was 16 years old. She learnt this work from her parents and her husband. When her husband was in El Salvador, she worked in the field. Now her crops are located two kilometres away from her home. Her children help her with her work when they are not at school. Rosa gets up at 5:00 a.m. to make breakfast for her children. 

The loan will be used to buy fertilisers and foliar fertilisers for her maize crops.

Rosa’s dream is that her children would become professionals. She also dreams of seeing her husband again.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers and foliar fertilisers for her maize crops

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es:
José, de 44 años de edad estudio noveno grado, por dedicarse a trabajar decidió dejar sus estudios porque su padre falleció cuando él tenía doce años de edad, actualmente está casado y tiene dos hijos los cuales  ellos están estudiando, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

José es una persona muy trabajadora se dedica a la carpintería desde los 8 años el ayudaba a su padre el cual hacia ataúdes de madera el poco tiempo que paso con su padre a prendió mucho, luego de la muerte de su padre José trabajaba junto a sus hermanos mayores los cuales se hicieron cargo de la funeraria luego de la muerte de su padre en 1993 saco un curso de especialización en carpintería,  luego decidió poner su propio negocio tiene doce años de tener su propia carpintería.

El crédito será utilizado en la compra de la materia prima para la elaboración de muebles, ya que tiene unos trabajos encargados, el préstamo mejorara sus ingresos porque de no tener la materia prima no puede hacer los trabajos. 

El sueño de José es darles el estudio a sus hijos darles una vida mejor para en un futuro verlos desarrollados como personas de bien, José espera tener las ganancias necesarias  para ampliar la galera donde trabaja y realizar su trabajo mas cómodo.
texts.en: Jose is 44 years old. He studied up to ninth grade. Since he had to work, he decided to stop attending school, because his father passed away when he was twelve years old. Currently, he is married and has two children who go to school. His wife works in household chores. Jose is a very hardworking person who has worked in carpentry since he was 8 years old. He used to help his father who worked making wooden coffins. The short time he spent with his father, he learned a lot. After his father's death, Jose worked with his older brothers, who took care of the funeral home after their father's death. In 1993, he received a specialization certificate in carpentry. Afterwards, he decided to start his own business. It has been twelve years since he opened his own carpentry business. He will use the loan to buy raw material for furniture making, because he already has some orders. The loan will improve his income, because without raw material he can not produce the orders. Jose's dream is to give his children an education, to give them a better life so he can see them become good people. Jose hopes to have the necessary earnings to expand the shed where he works and be able to work more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy wood for furniture production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pork and poultry meat for resale.

loans.name: Zacatecas Group

texts.es:
Ubicada dentro del Estado de México la comunidad donde radical el grupo Zacatecas es especialmente tranquila y llena de vegetación. Los cultivos de maíz se ven fuertemente beneficiados cuando llega la temporada de lluvias. Además, los habitantes se dedican a la cría de animales aprovechando los vastos pastizales. 
   Don Antonio es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre está de muy buen humor. Es muy dedicado a su familia compuesta por su esposa Lidia y sus seis hijos de los cuales ya sólo dos dependen de la pareja; uno estudia la educación secundaria y el otro la universidad. 
   Antonio es taxista y su actividad le es suficiente para solventar los gastos del hogar, el apoyo de su familia siempre ha sido su principal motivación. "Mi hermano me ayudó a comprar el taxi y yo adquirí las placas para iniciar a transitar mi unidad” comentó. Él inicia sus labores a muy temprana hora para tener un mejor ingreso, actualmente trabaja en una base estable lo que le llena de satisfacción pues todos respetan las reglas para continuar perteneciendo a ella. Antonio y sus compañeros tienen un turno fijo para ofrecer los servicios pero él no tiene inconveniente si le solicitan algún viaje especial.
   Don Antonio está muy agradecido y contento porque su negocio está dando los resultados esperados. Sus hijos continúan estudiando e incluso puede dedicarse a la cría cerdos lo que le representa ingresos extra. Ahora con el préstamo compraría  llantas, amortiguadores y realizaría cambios de aceite.
   Su único sueño es que sus hijos puedan terminar una carrera profesional para que puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida, además de mantener la calidad en su actividad. 
   Los otros integrantes del grupo son Bernardo quien invertirá en una tienda de abarrotes y Don Gregorio, en su taxi.

*La fotografía fue tomada en el municipio, junto al taxi de Don Antonio quien viste la chamarra azul*
texts.en:
Located in the state of México, the community of the Zacatecas group is especially peaceful and full of vegetation. Corn crops are benefitting greatly when the rainy season arrives. Additionally, the residents are dedicated to raising animals—taking advantage of the vast pastures. 

Antonio is a very hard-working man, who is always in a good mood. He is very dedicated to his family, which is includes his wife Lidia and their six children, of whom only two depend on their parents. One of their children is in secondary school, and the other is in university.

Antonio is a taxi driver, and his work is enough to take care of the household expenses. Supporting his family has always been his main motivation. He says that his brother helped him to buy the taxi and that Antonio got his licenses to start driving around his area. He starts his work very early in the morning so that he has a better income. At present, he works in a stable area; this satisfied him, since everyone respects the rules to continue belonging to it. Antonio and his friends have a fixed shift during which they can offer their services, but he doesn’t find it inconvenient if they request a special trip.

Antonio is very thankful and happy because his business is yielding the desired results. His children continue studying, and he also raise pigs, which represents extra income. Now, with the loan, he will buy tires and shock absorbers and will do an oil change.

His only dream is for his children to finish a professional degree so that they can have a better quality of life. He also wants to maintain the quality of his work.

The other members are Bernardo, who will invest in a grocery store, and Gregorio, who will invest in his taxi.

* The photograph was taken in the city, with Antonio’s taxi. Antonio is in the blue jacket.

loans.use: to buy tires and shock absorbers and to do an oil change.

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es:
El Estado de México cuenta con varias comunidades apacibles, llenas de tradiciones y de gente dedicada a sus actividades laborales. El cultivo de maíz, sin embargo, sigue siendo la principal fuente de trabajo para la mayoría de los habitantes. 
   Doña Domitila es parte de dicha comunidad, todos la conocen como Doña Domi es, además, una persona muy trabajadora que cuenta con grandes proyectos para el bienestar de su localidad. Está casada con Don Juan desde hace más de 30 años y juntos formaron una familia con tres hijos.
   La actividad principal que lleva a cabo es la producción de abono orgánico que ofrece en sus dos presentaciones: líquido y sólido. El abono es producido por lombrices, a este procedimiento se le conoce como lombricaria y consiste en alimentar a los pequeños animales únicamente con restos orgánicos como fruta y verdura que transforman para obtener el producto final que se puede aprovechar en cualquier tipo de cultivo ya que otorga muchos beneficios a la tierra en comparación con fertilizantes químicos. 
   Doña Domi inició su actividad gracias al apoyo de un ingeniero agrónomo quien la capacitó, en ese mismo taller le prestaron las primeras lombrices y medio año después ya contaba con las propias; actualmente, Domi tiene catorce años de experiencia. Otras ocupaciones que tiene son la venta de flores ornamentales y el cultivo de haba, jitomate y durazno. Ahora necesita un crédito para comprar 50 flores (orquídeas), aceite de olivo, cristalería etc. ya que la han contratado para elaborar los arreglos florales de las graduaciones escolares.
  Por otro lado está muy contenta y agradecida con VisionFund porque ha podido hacer crecer sus negocios y con esto su hijo pudo terminar una carrera profesional. Domi desea que todos los productores puedan elaborar su propio abono para que ya no contaminen más la tierra, también le encantaría adquirir una camioneta para poder hacer sus entregas.

*La fotografía fue tomada justo cuando Doña Domi finalizaba un ramo para novia*
texts.en:
The state of Mexico has a number of tranquil communities full of traditions and people dedicated to their work. Raising corn, nevertheless, continues being the principal source of work for the majority of the inhabitants.

Doña Domitila is part of this community. Everyone knows her as Doña Domi. She is, furthermore, a very hard-working person who has big projects for the well-being of her area. She has been married to Don Juan for more than 30 years, and together they formed a family with three children.

The principal activity that she carries out is the production of organic compost that she offers in two forms: liquid and solid. The compost is produced by worms, and the process is known as worm composting. It consists of feeding the little animals solely with organic scraps such as fruits and vegetables, which are transformed to obtain the final product, which can be used on any type of crop, since it offers many benefits to the earth, in comparison with chemical fertilizers.

Doña Domi began her business thanks to the help of an agronomy engineer who trained her. In this same workshop, they gave her the first worms, and half a year later she already had her own. Now Domi has 14 years of experience. Other jobs that she has are selling ornamental flowers and raising broad beans, tomatoes, and peaches. Now she needs a loan to buy 50 flowers (orchids), olive oil, glassware, etc., since they have contracted her to make the flower arrangements for the school graduations.

On the other hand, she is very happy and grateful to VisionFund because she has been able to make her businesses grow, and with this, her son was able to finish a professional course. Domi wants all the producers to be able to make their own organic compost, so that they will not contaminate the earth any more. She also would like to be able to acquire a truck to make her deliveries.

The photograph was taken just when Doña Domi was finishing a bouquet for a bride.

loans.use: to buy 50 flowers (orchids), olive oil, and glassware

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: EDUARDO: Es un hombre luchador, pertenece a la etnia miskita de Lapam-Llano sur, localizada aproximadamente a 80 kilómetros del municipio de Bilwi. Está casado, tiene 2 hijos 	que estudian su primaria. Con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de su hogar y tener una vivienda más digna y segura para su familia, solicita un préstamo para mejorar su vivienda que es de  madera y tambo. Con su préstamo quiere comprar materiales de construcción: madera, zinc, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es llegar a tener una vivienda de concreto (cemento) porque es de mayor durabilidad.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a determined man who belongs to the Mistiko ethnicity of Lapam, which is in the Llano Sur region and located approximately 80 kilometers from the Bilwi municipality. He is married with 2 children who are in elementary school.

With the goal of improving the condition of his home and having a decent and secure house for his family, Eduardo is requesting a loan to improve his house, which is made of wood and stilts. He wants to buy construction materials with the loan, such as wood, metal, nails, and it will also cover the labor costs.

His dream is to have a house made of concrete because it is more durable.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as wood, metal, and nails, and to cover labor costs.

loans.name: Grupo San Francisco Solo Group

texts.es:
Grupo San Francisco Solo se ubica dentro de una comunidad mazahua en el Estado de México. La actividad económica más importante es el cultivo de maíz con el que se elaboran las tradicionales tortillas mexicanas. Las personas de dicha localidad se caracterizan por ser amables y trabajadoras, además, aún conservan sus tradiciones y festividades que transmiten de generación en generación. El día de muertos es una de las celebraciones más importantes en el país y en la comunidad del grupo acostumbran crear ofrendas con alimentos, bebidas, dulces y frutos de acuerdo con lo que más les gustaba a sus seres queridos en vida.
   Olga es una joven mujer dedicada al trabajo, siempre con un muy buen humor. Ella es soltera, aún vive con sus padres y actualmente trabaja como empleada doméstica. Siempre ha sido una chica muy emprendedora por lo que, con la oportunidad del préstamo, piensa comprar dos borregos pequeños para poder tener cuatro en total dentro de su corral.
   Ella tiene cuatro meses como criadora de borregos, la motivación siempre ha provenido de sus padres ya que ellos comparten la misma actividad. "Aunque se tardan en crecer, es un muy buen negocio pues cuando se logran vender se obtienen muy buenas ganancias" comentó muy contenta Olga. 
   Por el momento su prioridad es incrementar sus ganancias por lo que prolongará la  venta de sus animales. "Mis padres me han ofrecido su apoyo incondicional para lograr mi meta" comenta Olga, quien se muestra muy emocionada porque gracias al préstamo puede continuar con su propio negocio y espera algún día establecer una tienda de abarrotes dentro de su comunidad. 
   Los integrantes del grupo son Julia, Ana Laura y María Josefina quienes invertirían en becerros; Luis, en cerdos; Juan, en pollos y Porfirio, en borregos.

*La fotografía fue tomada en las escaleras del quiosco municipal, Olga es quien viste el suéter Rosa*
texts.en:
Group San Francisco Solo is located inside a mazahua community in the Estado de Mexico. The most important economic occupation is farming maize, which is used to make traditional Mexican tortillas. The people of this community are characterized as being kind and hard-working, and they still keep their traditions and festivals, which they transmit from generation to generation. The day of the dead is one of the most important celebrations in the country, and in the group’s community they have the custom to make offerings of food, drinks, sweets, and fruit according to what their loved ones liked most in life. 
Olga is a young woman, very dedicated to her work, and always in a good mood. She is single, still lives with her parents, and currently works as a domestic employee. She has always been a very entrepreneurial girl, which is why, with the opportunity of the loan, she plans to buy two small sheep so she can have a total of four in her pen. 
She has been raising sheep for four months. Her motivation has always come from her parents, as they have the same occupation. “Though it takes time for them to grow, it is very good business, because when you sell them, you obtain very good profits,” Olga says happily. 
At the moment, her priority is to increase her profits, which is why she will extend the sale of her animals. “My parents have offered me their unconditional support to achieve my goal,” says Olga, who is very excited because thanks to the loan she can continue with her own business and hopes one day to open a grocery store inside the community. 
The members of the group are Julia, Ana Laura, and Maria Josefina, who will invest in calves; Luis, in pigs; Juan, in chickens, and Porfirio, in sheep.

*The photograph was takes on the stairs of the municipal kiosk, Olga is wearing a pink sweater.

loans.use: to buy two small sheep.

location.town: San Francisco Solo, San Jose del Rincon

loans.name: Transito

texts.es:
Tránsito  de 52 años de edad, se ha dedicado  siempre a la agricultura, la siembra de granos básicos  asi como a la siembra de  sandía y ajonjolí ya que el no tuvo la  oportunidad de asistir a la escuela .actual mente está acompañado tiene tres hijos uno ya tiene su propio hogar los que viven con él  están estudiando,  Transito todos los días trabaja duro para que no les falte el pan de cada día a su familia.

Transito ha trabajado la agricultura desde su niñez ya que su padre le enseño a trabajar la tierra .Por eso ahora  es lo que le genera ingresos. 

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar abono y fertilizantes  para tener buenas cosechas en la siembra granos básicos,  y así obtener los ingresos para cancelar el crédito y tener el sustento para su  familia.

Tránsito, sueña con que sus hijos sigan estudiando y se preparen académicamente, para que en un futuro tengan una vida mejor, y además les enseña a trabajar la agricultura.
texts.en:
Tránsito is 52 years old. He has always made a living in agriculture, planting basic grains as well as watermelon and sesame, since he had no opportunity to attend school. Currently he has three children: one has his own home and the others who live with him are studying. Tránsito works hard everyday so that he does not lack the daily bread for his family.

Tránsito has worked in agriculture since childhood, as his father taught him to work the land. Due to this, he is now able to generate income.

The money from the loan is necessary to purchase fertilizer to have a good harvest in the planting of basic grains, and also to obtain the income to pay off the loan and have sustenance for his family.

Tránsito dreams that his children continue studying and prepare academically, so that in the future they can have a better life. He also wants to teach them to work in agriculture.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and grains for planting.

loans.name: Sat's Group

texts.en:
A mother of two dependent children living in Kratie province, Sat is 45 years old. For her family condition, she manages to earn income via growing cassava. She sometimes works for others for a fee in order to supplement her family’s income. This year, her cassava does not grow well, so she cannot sell the outputs at a good price. This really affects her financial plan because she cannot support her family’s needs on time. 

Now, she has decided to form a group of three to apply for a new loan; this will be her second cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loan. As a group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and seeds to increase the crop products. She hopes that she can get more income from her growing business to update her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds to increase the crop products

loans.name: Phan's Group

texts.en:
Phan, a farmer living in Kratie province, is 41 years old and a mother of five children, four of whom are dependent on her. There are two children who are in school, and they need better support with their studies. To support her family living, she earns income via growing cassava and working for others for a fee. She has been involved in this business for ages, and it earns her about 35,800 KHR per day. 

Lacking capital to support her business, Phan has decided to lead a group of two members to get a 1,500,000 KHR loan. This will be her third cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has repaid her past loans completely. As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer and seeds to support her cassava farm. 

She hopes that her cash crop will be rich in nutrients and enable her to get more yields than ever before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds to support her cassava farm

loans.name: Chen's Group

texts.en:
A villager living in Kampong Cham province, Chen is 50 years old and a mother of five dependent children. She grows rice as the main source of income and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. She has been involved in this business for 31 years. Her daily income earns her around 26,000 KHR per day, and she can save about 12,000 KHR each day. 

This is Chen's third cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. With her past loan, her family is getting better than before. In a group of three, she is the group leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to pay for a plowing fee and to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farm. She hopes that she can gain more yields than last year.

loans.use: to pay for a plowing fee and to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Maria Agustina

texts.es:
María, está soltera, tiene 2 hijos y en su casa también vive su mamá.

María, se dedicaba a vender tortillas, pero ahora vende pupusas desde hace un año, decidió colocar este negocio porque obtenía mejores ingresos; la pupusería la tiene en el mismo domicilio y su madre le ayuda a vender pupusas.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar productos para la pupuseria.

El sueño de María es, tener una casa propia.
texts.en:
María is single, has 2 children and her mother lives with her. She works selling tortillas, but she has been selling pupusas (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans) for the last year. 

She decided to establish her business since it would give her more incomes. The pupuseria (a shop that sells pupusas) is located at her place of residence and her mother helps her selling the pupusas. 

She needs the loan to buy products for the pupuseria. Maria’s dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy products for the pupuseria.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es: Roberto de37  años de edad vive en casa propia con su tres hijos,  él se dedica a la compra y venta  de cocos desde hace 24  años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas cocos por mayor y así continuar con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo e ingresos.
texts.en: Roberto is 37 years old and lives in his own home with his three children. He has been buying and selling coconuts for 24 years. His business is located in his home and with his sales he has been able to get ahead. He is requesting a loan to buy more coconuts wholesale so that he can continues his sales as this is his only source of work and income.

loans.use: to buy coconuts wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy metallic sheets for her husband's metal clamp making business.

loans.name: Hamida

texts.en:
Hamida, aged in her mid-40s, is single and has three children. She has been running a poultry business for the past two years. Hamida's business is doing well and she is able to care for her family. She works from 6 am to 11 pm each working day and is able to make a good return per month. 

This is Hamida's 10th loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania and she has successfully repaid all loans. She used the previous loans to purchase a motorbike taxi (a boda-boda) and broilers (chicks). She will invest this loan to buy broilers and feed. Hamida will be accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: To to buy broilers (chicks) and feed.

loans.name: Gilma Yaneth

texts.es:
Gilma, de 42 años de edad se  dedica a los oficios domésticos y a hacer costuras para poder sacar a su hijos adelantes, actualmente realiza las mismas actividades ya que por medio de ellas lleva el sustento a su hogar

Gilma  ya tiene unos 20 años de dedicarse a la elaboración de costuras ya que es de donde  provienen sus ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos.

El crédito será utilizado en  la Siembra de los granos básicos ya que siempre siembra 6 tareas de Maíz para su alimentación diaria.

El sueño de  Gilma es seguir  trabajando duramente para poder sacar a sus hijos adelante y que ellos tengan una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gimla is 42 years old and works doing household chores and as a seamstress to provide for her children. She is currently doing both jobs since this allows her to support her family. Gilma has been working as a seamstress for 20 years, this is where the income to help her children comes from. 

The loan will be used to plant basic grains since she always plants six "tareas" (629 square meters) of corn for her daily food supply. Gilma's dream is to keep working hard to be able to provide for her children and that they will have a good quality of life.

loans.use: to plant basic grains and buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cow to supplement his farming activity.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
Ismael, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado, su esposa es enfermera y tienen 3 hijos.

Ismael, toda su vida se ha dedicado a trabajar en la agricultura, este trabajo lo aprendió gracias a su padre. Además, aprendió el oficio de albañilería, de esas dos actividades dependen sus ingresos, actualmente siembra 7,000 metros cuadrados de cultivo de maíz y frijol, el terreno donde cultiven está muy cerca de su casa y recibe ayuda de toda su familia.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes, de esta forma podrá obtener una buena producción.

El sueño de Ismael es, ser un chef porque desde pequeño ha sido su sueño.
texts.en:
Ismael went to school until the ninth grade. He is married, his wife is a nurse and they have three children. Ismael has worked in agriculture his whole life. He learned this work from his father. He also learned the craft of masonry. His income depends on these two jobs. 

He currently sows 7,000 square meters of corn and beans. The plot where he farms is very close to his home and he receives help from his entire family. He needs this loan to buy fertilizers, this will allow him to have a good production. Ismael's dream is to be a chef, this has been his dream since he was a child.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Asad's Group

texts.en:
The three members of Asad’s Group are married men, with an average age of 30, and all live in a village called Dera Sardaran located in the Punjab province in Pakistan.

All are farmers and are collaborating with the micro-finance institution, JWS, to carry out their farm work. They are on their sixth farm loan with this institution. 

As is the case with Asad, standing in the middle with his hand raised in the group photo, the crops they grow are wheat and rice.  With his loan, Asad intends to pay for farm inputs, seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and the labour fee for land preparation. 

After the harvest, the produce will be sold to the nearby market. Asad plans on making an average profit of PKR 50,000 per five acres planted. This profit will enable him to repay his loan and to assist his family.

loans.use: to pay for farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and the labour fee for land preparation.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María de 47 años de edad se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos desde que estaba junto a sus padres ya que no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir  a la escuela, luego se casó, madre de dos hijos. María cuenta con una tienda, de la cual obtiene ingresos y aportar al sustento del hogar

María tiene ya cuatro años de trabajar una tienda lo cual ya tiene su clientela y sabe cómo administrar su negocio.

El Dinero del crédito lo necesita para la compra de ganado para engordarlo y venderlo en un tiempo determinado ya que siempre  ha trabajado con ganado y tiene como poder cuidarlos y asi obtener sus ganancias.


María sueña con sacar a sus hijos adelante,  tener un establo y tener su ganado cerca de su casa para poder cuidarlo mejor y de esa manera obtener mejores ganancias a la hora de vender.
texts.en:
María is 47 years old and she done domestic work since she was with her parents because she did not have the opportunity to go to school. Later she got married, and now is the mother of two children. María runs a shop from which she earns an income and contributes to supporting the household.

For four years, María has been running her store which has clientele, and she knows how to run her business. 

She needs the money from the loan to buy cattle to fatten and sell in a determined time since she has always worked with cattle, and she is able to take care of them and in that way gain profit.

María dreams of getting her children ahead, having a stable and having her cattle close to her house to be able to take care of them better, and in that way earn better profits when it's time to sell them.

loans.use: to buy cattle to fatten

loans.name: Marina De Jesus

texts.es: Marina de 24 años de edad, vive en casa humilde pero de su  propiedad al lado de  su compañero de vida y su hija de 1 año de edad.  Ella se dedica a laborar en un puesto de comida rápida haciendo las funciones de atención al cliente y cocinera, y con los ingresos que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, además su compañero de vida presta sus servicios como agente de seguridad y aporta a la casa para de esa forma poder salir adelante y tener una vida digna. Marina  desea construir un cuarto de habitación con el propósito de brindar a su familia una mejor condición de vida pero como no posee suficiente capital  está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para poder comprar:   cemento, arena, polines, pago de mano de obra entre otros materiales para iniciar la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio y  así ella y su familia puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
Marina is 24 years old, and lives in her own humble house with her life partner and her 1 year old daughter. 

She works in a fast food job as a customer server and cook. With what she earns from work, she manages to pay for some household expenses. In addition, her life partner offers his services as a security agent and supports the household so that in this way they can get ahead and have a dignified life.

Marina wants to construct a room in her house in order to give her family a better quality of life, but since she does not have sufficient capital, she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to be able to buy: cement, sand, beams, labor, among other materials to start construction on a bedroom so that she and her family can live more safely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, beams, and labor among other materials to start construction of a bedroom

loans.name: Veronicah

texts.en:
Veronicah is a married woman. She owns a house that has neither piped water nor electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food.
 
Veronicah has operated a tailoring business for the past two years. She makes women's suits and men's suits. Her potential clients are ladies and gents. She dreams of establishing a boutique in the future. 

With the KES 30,000 she wants to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business

loans.name: Yadigar

texts.en:
Yadigar is a 52-year-old, married man and refugee. He is married and has a son and two daughters. His wife is a housekeeper, and they live in an IDP (internally displaced person) settlement.   

Yadigar earns money for his family by raising up seasonal vegetables. He has been working in this area for 20 years and has good experience in this. His monthly income is 220 AZN.
 
Fresh vegetables are in high demand and people buy them very often. The region where Yadigar lives is very severe and almost after every summer, it’s hard for him to get a good harvest. This reduces his income. 

He applied for 1,200 AZN in order to buy new good fertilizers and build a greenhouse for trees. Help Yadigar and make his life easier.

loans.use: to buy new good fertilizers and build a greenhouse for trees

loans.name: Melvin

texts.en:
Melvin is a married woman who manages a store for income. She is 34 years old and has a child attending school. 

In her store, she sells grocery items. Aside from selling grocery items, she also cooks and sells food for meals. She wanted to increase her sales; that is why she is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy grocery items such as canned goods, breads, noodles, sugar and soft drinks to sell in her store. 

Someday, she hopes to achieve income stability for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell in her store

loans.name: Samoun's Group

texts.en:
A mother of four dependent children living in Kampong Cham province, Samoun is 59 years old. Because of her family, she grows cassava as the main source of income. Moreover, she earns more income via working for others for a fee. She has been involved in this business for 29 years. She can earn income of about 29,000 KHR per day, and she can save around 10,000 KHR each day. 

For Samoun, this is her second loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loan completely. For her past loan, she can update her condition better than before. 

Now, she leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy seed and pay labor fees to support her farm. She hopes that she can get more yield than before.

loans.use: to buy seed and pay labor fees to support her farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Teat's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer living in Siem Reap province, Teat is 34 years old and a mother of three dependent children, two of whom are in still in school. To support her family condition, she grows paddy rice as the main source of income. She also raises a cow to add more income. She has been involved in this business for ages, and it earns her about 23,600 KHR per day. 

This year, her farming business is being threatened by the drought. This leads her cash crop to produce less output. Therefore, Teat decided to form a group of two to get a loan. This is first time for Teat with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer for her cash crop so that it will produce great crop products for her; she hopes that she can gain more income from her well-grown business to improve her living standard.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cash crop so that it will produce great crop products for her

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Fidel Angel

texts.es:
Fidel, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado, su esposa es comerciante y tienen 2 hijos y asisten a la escuela.

Fidel, desde muy pequeño inicio a trabajar junto a su padre en la siembra de granos básicos, toda su vida se ha dedicado a trabajar en la agricultura y tiene muchos años en la venta de leña, la cual es podada en las fincas de café. 

El crédito será utilizado para comprar leña y poder continuar con el negocio y ayudara a salir adelante a sus hijos.

El sueño de Fidel es, que sus hijos se puedan superar y mejoren su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fidel studied up to secondary school, he is in a relationship, his wife is a merchant and they have 2 children who attend school. 

Fidel, when he was very little started working with his father in planting staple foods, his whole life has been spent working in agriculture and he has many years in the sale of firewood, which is cut on coffee plantations. 

The loan will be used to buy firewood and to enable him to continue with the business and it will help his children get ahead. 

Fidel’s dream is that his children be able to excel and that they improve their quality of life.

loans.use: buy firewood and be able to continue with the business.

loans.name: Yat's Group

texts.en:
Yat, aged 37, is the mother of three schoolchildren. She lives in a remote area of the Kampong Cham province’s Tbaung Khmum district. For the past 19 years, Yat has earned income to support her family's living conditions via fish-catching and pig-raising. She is able to earn about 94,000 KHR per day, of which she can save around 36,000 KHR each day after offsetting her business expenses. 

For Yat, this is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In her group of three members, she is the group leader. Yat will spend her entire loan portion to buy pig feed and enclosures. She hopes that she can increase her income to support her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and enclosures

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Hugo Ernesto

texts.es: Hugo de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hermana, él posee una tienda desde hace 2 años la cual inicio con capital propio, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de granos básicos, huevos, pan dulce, leche y además construir un techo para  que los clientes estén más cómodos a la hora de que llegan a comprar y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos para una mejor estabilidad.
texts.en:
Hugo is 33 years old and lives in a house that he owns with his sister. Hugo has owned a shop for two years. He opened it with his own capital. Hugo's business is located in his home. 

Hugo is applying for a loan in order to buy basic grains, eggs, sweet bread, and milk. Hugo also wants to build a roof so that his customers a more comfortable when they come to buy products. Hugo can thus earn a higher income and have more stable finances.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, sweet bread, milk, and more.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: Jose de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos maíz y frijol desde hace 15 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentra cerca de su casa y con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas, insecticidas y así poder obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
José is 42 years old and lives in a house that he owns with his family. José has been making a living growing basic grains corn and beans for 15 years. He sells his produce in the different markets near to his house and sales help him to move forward in life.

José is applying for a loan in order to buy seeds, manure, fertilisers, weed-killer and insecticides and thus earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilisers, weed-killer and insecticides.

loans.name: María Antonia

texts.es:
María, estudio hasta cuarto grado, es madre soltera de 3 hijos, ya que su pareja la abandono y ella tomó toda la responsabilidad de sus hijos. 

María, ha enfrentado muchas dificultades en su vida, desde pequeña inicio a trabajar junto a su madre a vender frutas y verduras; también trabajo vendiendo pan francés durante aproximadamente 6 años.- Hace dos años y medio, inicio con la venta de ropa, una de sus amigas la motivo a dedicarse a este tipo de trabajo; ella trabaja todos los días de 7:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m. y viaja en bus a los pueblos vecinos.

El crédito lo necesita para continuar invirtiendo en el negocio de venta de ropa, de esa forma podrá salir adelante.

María, sueña con tener un lugar estable donde poder ofrecer su mercadería.
texts.en:
María has a fourth-grade education. She is a single mother to three children as her partner left her and she took responsibility for their children.

María has faced many difficulties in life. From a young age, she worked with her mother selling fruits and vegetables. María also worked selling bread for six years. Two and a half years ago María began selling clothes. One of her friends motivated her to do this kind of work. María works every day from 7am until 3pm and travels by bus to neighbouring towns.

María needs this loan in order to continue investing in her clothes business. She can thus move forward in life.

María dreams of having a stable place where she can sell her merchandise.

loans.use: to continue investing in her clothes business.

loans.name: Delmy Fidelina

texts.es:
Delmy, estudio hasta bachillerato, es madre soltera, su pequeña hija tiene 3 años de edad y vive junto con sus abuelos.

Delmy, desde que terminó sus estudios consiguió trabajo en una ferretería en donde laboro durante 4 años, luego inicio a trabajar en un una venta de pupusas.- Actualmente, ha iniciado a trabajar junto a su madre en la venta de ropa, en donde viaja a las ciudades cercanas para comercializar su mercadería. 

El crédito será utilizado para comprar más ropa y de esta manera sacar adelante a su hija y cubrir los gastos del hogar.

Delmy, sueña con tener casa propia y poder tener un local estable para ofrecer sus productos.
texts.en:
Delmy completed high school. She is a single mother. Her young daughter is three years old and lives with her grandparents.

On finishing her studies, Delmy found work at a DIY shop where she worked for four years. Later, she started to work selling "pupusas" (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans). She now works selling clothes with her mother. She travels to nearby cities to sell her merchandise.

This loan will be used to buy more clothes and help her daughter and cover household costs.

Delmy dreams of having her own house and having stable premises where she can sell her products.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es: Don Rodolfo, tiene 56 años de edad, es casado, tiene 5 hijos, vive en una aldea rural del municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara junto a sus esposa y dos hijos. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, hace mas de 22 años que cultiva sus propios cultivos de café, y granos básicos como maíz y frijoles. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local pues es su única fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. Esta solicitando el quinto préstamo a ODEF, que es por la cantidad de 5,000 Lempiras, el cual lo invertirá en darle asistencia y mantenimiento a sus cultivos, comprará abono, fertilizantes y cubrirá gastos de limpieza de la finca de café. Esta inversión le ayuda a sacar mas producción y de calidad. Su meta es obtener mas ganancias para comprar ganado y tambien piensa remodelar su casa para vivir mejor con su familia.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is 56 years old, married and has five children. He lives in a rural village in the Nueva Frontera municipality with his wife and two of his children.

All of his life, Rodolfo has worked in farming. For 22 years old, he has grown coffee and basic grains, such as corn and beans. He sells his products at the local market. It is his only source of income for supporting his family. 

Rodolfo is applying for his fifth loan from ODEF. This loan is for 5,000 Lempira and it will be used to look after Rodolfo's crops. He will buy manure and fertilisers, and to pay for cleaning of his coffee plantation.

This investment will help Rodolfo to increase his yield of quality products. His goal is to earn a higher profit in order to buy cattle. He is also thinking about remodeling his house in order to live a better life with his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilisers, and to pay for cleaning of his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Juan Efrain

texts.es:
Juan, de 24 años de edad, está acompañado, estudio hasta bachillerato, pero por la falta de oportunidades se ha dedicado a las actividades que le enseñaron sus padres, mientras su pareja le apoya en las actividades de la casa.

Juan,  trabaja en una parcela que posee durante la mañana y en la tarde se dedica a trabajar en otras parcelas, para obtener un ingreso adicional para su familia. 


Juan, necesita el dinero para comprar una vaca, ya que se la venden en buen precio y él quiero iniciar con la producción de leche y obtener un ingreso adicional.

Juan, sueña con comprar más ganado para aumentar la producción de leche.
texts.en:
Juan, who is 24 years old, has a partner. He studied as far as the high school diploma but because of a lack of opportunities he has gone into the line of work which his parents taught him, while his partner helps him in the household tasks. In the morning Juan works on a plot of land which he has and in the afternoon he works on other land, to get extra income for his family. 

Juan needs the money to buy a cow, since it's being sold at a good price and he wants to start up milk production and make additional income. Juan's dream is to buy more animals to increase his milk production.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, lociones y artículos de belleza, se dedica a las ventas desde hace varios años e inicio con capital propio, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante, ella esta solicitado un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para surtir su negocio y así poder tener mejores ganancia.
texts.en:
Maria, who is 48 years old, lives in her own house with her two children. She makes a living selling clothing, lotions and beauty products. She has been selling these for several years and started out with her own capital. Her business is based in her place of residence and with the sales she makes she manages to make progress.

Maria is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise wholesale to stock her business and so make better profits.

loans.use: to buy clothing, lotions and beauty products.

loans.name: Rwandema Women Group

texts.en:
Catherine is shown in the photo above, standing in the middle and wearing a blue dress and white top. She is 55 years old and a mother of 3 children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2011 to benefit from their trainings, particularly the enterprise development training.

Catherine is a vegetable and dairy farmer. She also sells second-hand clothes to supplement her income. She will use her loan portion to buy more second-hand clothes. This additional clothing stock will help Catherine meet customer demand and earn extra income, which she'll spend paying her family expenses at ease, including food, clothing and school fees.

Catherine is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: to buy more second-hand clothes to sell.
